story:
Frogsleap Foundation là một doanh nghiệp xã hội hoạt động với hình thức tổ chức phi lợi nhuận hướng đến sự phát triển bền vững của cộng đồng thông qua giáo dục, công nghệ xanh và trao đổi văn hóa. Từ kinh nghiệm tổ chức dự án cộng đồng trước đây, Frogsleap Foundation đang ấp ủ kinh doanh phi lợi nhuận các sản phẩm/dịch vụ có thể giải quyết vấn đề về môi trường và xã hội, với nguồn thu được tái đầu tư vào các hoạt động vì cộng đồng.

Frogsleap Foundation SHOP

Frogsleap Foundation SHOP được ra đời nhằm đạt được mục đích trên. Đây là cửa hàng dịch vụ thu gom và bán lại đồ cũ giá rẻ nhằm gây quỹ để đẩy mạnh nghiên cứu công nghệ xanh, hoàn thiện chương trình sẵn có và phát triển các hoạt động cộng đồng thiết thực khác trong tương lai.

SHOP sẽ giải quyết nhu cầu của những người chưa có cách xử lí đồ đạc đã qua sử dụng nhưng vẫn còn tốt sau mỗi lần dọn nhà hay đi du lịch. Từ đó, chúng ta có thể giảm thiểu lượng rác thải không đáng có từ những vật dụng có thể tái sử dụng nhưng vẫn đáp ứng nhu cầu của người có hoàn cảnh khó khăn còn đang thiếu thốn về cơ sở vật chất trong cuộc sống.

SHOP hoạt động hàng ngày tại một vị trí cố định, nơi khách hàng có thể đến tìm mua vật dụng giá rẻ hoặc quyên góp sản phẩm cho SHOP. Ngoài ra, SHOP còn có dịch vụ thu gom tại nhà, đặt hàng online và vận chuyển tận nơi. 

Tính tới thời điểm hiện tại, SHOP chúng tôi đã có địa điểm đặt cửa hàng trên đường Nơ Trang Long, thành phố Hồ Chí Minh. Về nhân sự, SHOP được mở dựa trên nền tảng của Frogsleap Foundation. Chúng tôi có những tình nguyện viên nhiệt tình, gắn bó và rất năng nổ để cùng thực hiện ý tưởng. Sắp tới, chúng tôi sẽ thực hiện kế hoạch kinh doanh trên các kênh truyền thông đại chúng như mạng xã hội Facebook, các trang thông tin điện tử đồng thời quảng bá qua các chương trình tình nguyện chúng tôi thực hiện. Chúng tôi tin rằng thương hiệu của Frogsleap Foundation SHOP sẽ nhanh chóng đến được với xã hội như một loại hình dịch vụ không những hữu ích cho người sử dụng mà còn mang lại lợi ích thiết thực cho cộng đồng. 

Cơ cấu sử dụng vốn:

Cơ sở vật chất:

1.    Mặt bằng: 5,000,000 VNĐ / tháng
2.    Kệ, giá, tủ, vv…: 8,000,000 VNĐ

Lương nhân viên: 

1.    Quản SHOP: 3,000,000 VNĐ / tháng
2.    Dịch vụ tiện ích (giao hàng, lấy hàng tận nơi): 2,000,000 VNĐ / tháng

Truyền thông: 2,000,000 VNĐ

------------------

Frogsleap Foundation là tên gọi của quỹ hoạt động xã hội và triển khai dự án cộng đồng. Được thành lập và cố vấn bởi các cựu sinh viên Việt Nam tại Anh Quốc, các hoạt động của Frogsleap Foundation đều mang tính chất phi lợi nhuận và đem lại lợi ích thiết thực cho cộng đồng.

Các dự án của Frogsleap Foundation được thực hiện bởi đội ngũ tình nguyện viên nhiệt tình từ các trường Đại học, Cao đẳng tại Việt Nam và nước ngoài. Chúng tôi mong muốn trở thành tổ chức đáng tin cậy tại Việt Nam về mô hình hoạt động xanh cho thanh niên: lưu trú tại gia kết hợp với du lịch tình nguyện. Thông qua mô hình độc đáo này, trở thành tổ chức tiên phong trong việc ứng dụng công nghệ xanh để giải quyết các vấn đề địa phương tại Việt Nam, hỗ trợ cho sự phát triển bền vững cộng đồng.

Các thành công đã đạt được:

Năm 2012: Xây dựng và trao tặng trạm phát - nạp điện năng lượng Mặt Trời cho 15 hộ dân tại địa phương Cồn Hô. Tặng máy tính, sách và trang bị cho thư viện, tổ chức các lớp học anh văn cho trường tiểu học Đại Phước A, xã Đại Phước, huyện Càng Long, tỉnh Trà Vinh.

Năm 2013 - Hoàn thành 3 dự án mùa hè:

Quảng Nam - Đà Nẵng: Xây tặng địa phương 1 trường mẫu giáo, phát quang, xây dựng hàng rào đồng thời trao tặng 20 bộ bàn ghế mới cho trường. Dạy tiếng Anh cho gần 200 học sinh và trao tặng hơn 200 đầu sách tại trường THPT Chu Văn An.

Cồn Hô - Trà Vinh: Xây dựng và trao tặng nhà tre chống lũ cho gia đình chú Hai Linh - một hộ dân nghèo tại Cồn Hô. Tổ chức dạy học tiếng Anh và trại khoa học cho 25 trẻ nhỏ tại địa phương.

Đồng Nai: Trao tặng 40 phần học bổng, 5 bộ máy tính và 1 bộ bàn ghế cho giáo viên trường tiểu học Thanh Tùng. Sơn sửa lại hơn 100m vuông tường các lớp học của trường.

Năm 2014 - 2016: Hoàn tất lắp đặt hệ thống phát  nạp điện năng lượng Mặt Trời và hệ thống đèn tiết kiệm năng lượng cho từng hộ dân tại Cồn Hô. Trao tặng máy tính và tổ chức dạy học tiếng Anh cho các em học sinh trường Tiểu học Đức Mỹ A, xã Đức Mỹ, huyện Càng Long, tỉnh Trà Vinh.
story_txt: Frogsleap Foundation là một doanh nghiệp xã hội hoạt động với hình thức tổ chức phi lợi nhuận hướng đến sự phát triển bền vững của cộng đồng thông qua giáo dục, công nghệ xanh và trao đổi văn hóa. Từ kinh nghiệm tổ chức dự án cộng đồng trước đây, Frogsleap Foundation đang ấp ủ kinh doanh phi lợi nhuận các sản phẩm/dịch vụ có thể giải quyết vấn đề về môi trường và xã hội, với nguồn thu được tái đầu tư vào các hoạt động vì cộng đồng.Frogsleap Foundation SHOPFrogsleap Foundation SHOP được ra đời nhằm đạt được mục đích trên. Đây là cửa hàng dịch vụ thu gom và bán lại đồ cũ giá rẻ nhằm gây quỹ để đẩy mạnh nghiên cứu công nghệ xanh, hoàn thiện chương trình sẵn có và phát triển các hoạt động cộng đồng thiết thực khác trong tương lai.SHOP sẽ giải quyết nhu cầu của những người chưa có cách xử lí đồ đạc đã qua sử dụng nhưng vẫn còn tốt sau mỗi lần dọn nhà hay đi du lịch. Từ đó, chúng ta có thể giảm thiểu lượng rác thải không đáng có từ những vật dụng có thể tái sử dụng nhưng vẫn đáp ứng nhu cầu của người có hoàn cảnh khó khăn còn đang thiếu thốn về cơ sở vật chất trong cuộc sống.SHOP hoạt động hàng ngày tại một vị trí cố định, nơi khách hàng có thể đến tìm mua vật dụng giá rẻ hoặc quyên góp sản phẩm cho SHOP. Ngoài ra, SHOP còn có dịch vụ thu gom tại nhà, đặt hàng online và vận chuyển tận nơi. Tính tới thời điểm hiện tại, SHOP chúng tôi đã có địa điểm đặt cửa hàng trên đường Nơ Trang Long, thành phố Hồ Chí Minh. Về nhân sự, SHOP được mở dựa trên nền tảng của Frogsleap Foundation. Chúng tôi có những tình nguyện viên nhiệt tình, gắn bó và rất năng nổ để cùng thực hiện ý tưởng. Sắp tới, chúng tôi sẽ thực hiện kế hoạch kinh doanh trên các kênh truyền thông đại chúng như mạng xã hội Facebook, các trang thông tin điện tử đồng thời quảng bá qua các chương trình tình nguyện chúng tôi thực hiện. Chúng tôi tin rằng thương hiệu của Frogsleap Foundation SHOP sẽ nhanh chóng đến được với xã hội như một loại hình dịch vụ không những hữu ích cho người sử dụng mà còn mang lại lợi ích thiết thực cho cộng đồng. Cơ cấu sử dụng vốn:Cơ sở vật chất:1.    Mặt bằng: 5,000,000 VNĐ / tháng2.    Kệ, giá, tủ, vv…: 8,000,000 VNĐLương nhân viên: 1.    Quản SHOP: 3,000,000 VNĐ / tháng2.    Dịch vụ tiện ích (giao hàng, lấy hàng tận nơi): 2,000,000 VNĐ / thángTruyền thông: 2,000,000 VNĐ------------------Frogsleap Foundation là tên gọi của quỹ hoạt động xã hội và triển khai dự án cộng đồng. Được thành lập và cố vấn bởi các cựu sinh viên Việt Nam tại Anh Quốc, các hoạt động của Frogsleap Foundation đều mang tính chất phi lợi nhuận và đem lại lợi ích thiết thực cho cộng đồng.Các dự án của Frogsleap Foundation được thực hiện bởi đội ngũ tình nguyện viên nhiệt tình từ các trường Đại học, Cao đẳng tại Việt Nam và nước ngoài. Chúng tôi mong muốn trở thành tổ chức đáng tin cậy tại Việt Nam về mô hình hoạt động xanh cho thanh niên: lưu trú tại gia kết hợp với du lịch tình nguyện. Thông qua mô hình độc đáo này, trở thành tổ chức tiên phong trong việc ứng dụng công nghệ xanh để giải quyết các vấn đề địa phương tại Việt Nam, hỗ trợ cho sự phát triển bền vững cộng đồng.Các thành công đã đạt được:Năm 2012: Xây dựng và trao tặng trạm phát - nạp điện năng lượng Mặt Trời cho 15 hộ dân tại địa phương Cồn Hô. Tặng máy tính, sách và trang bị cho thư viện, tổ chức các lớp học anh văn cho trường tiểu học Đại Phước A, xã Đại Phước, huyện Càng Long, tỉnh Trà Vinh.Năm 2013 - Hoàn thành 3 dự án mùa hè:Quảng Nam - Đà Nẵng: Xây tặng địa phương 1 trường mẫu giáo, phát quang, xây dựng hàng rào đồng thời trao tặng 20 bộ bàn ghế mới cho trường. Dạy tiếng Anh cho gần 200 học sinh và trao tặng hơn 200 đầu sách tại trường THPT Chu Văn An.Cồn Hô - Trà Vinh: Xây dựng và trao tặng nhà tre chống lũ cho gia đình chú Hai Linh - một hộ dân nghèo tại Cồn Hô. Tổ chức dạy học tiếng Anh và trại khoa học cho 25 trẻ nhỏ tại địa phương.Đồng Nai: Trao tặng 40 phần học bổng, 5 bộ máy tính và 1 bộ bàn ghế cho giáo viên trường tiểu học Thanh Tùng. Sơn sửa lại hơn 100m vuông tường các lớp học của trường.Năm 2014 - 2016: Hoàn tất lắp đặt hệ thống phát  nạp điện năng lượng Mặt Trời và hệ thống đèn tiết kiệm năng lượng cho từng hộ dân tại Cồn Hô. Trao tặng máy tính và tổ chức dạy học tiếng Anh cho các em học sinh trường Tiểu học Đức Mỹ A, xã Đức Mỹ, huyện Càng Long, tỉnh Trà Vinh.

story:
Once in a thousand years, the planets align and a unique solar eclipse signals a game that has been played on this Earth for a hundred thousand years. During this time all the dark forces battle the forces of light for control of Earth and of the minds of its people.

The battle comes down to a one-on-one showdown between proxies, one person chosen by each side, to have their memories wiped clean and their minds filled with a single purpose - to destroy each other. The stakes are simple - the lives, minds, and souls of all mankind. These two people have an everlasting title - the forces of good unite behind The EXORCIST, and the others back SLAVER.

This, the last Exorcist, is a girl of twenty years, and her nemesis is a boy of about 25. How can one live without context? Without knowledge of a family and loved ones, even with the powers of a superhero? And, in a twist not predicted by the Gods, what if a sliver of consciousness remains? What if these humans, subjugated to fight each other in the colosseum of the Earth, retain some human feeling? What...if...they fall in love? Will their powers be a gift or a curse? That’s why this battle is unique among a thousand such previous bouts. What happens when emotion meets mission, and calling meets a feeling of … kin?

THERE'S STRENGTH IN NUMBERS.

THEY CAN'T STOP US - JOIN HER FIGHT!

I'm Victoria Unikel, and my life has been spent entirely in ENTERTAINMENT. I planned to release this story of a SUPERHERO and a WORLD with MYSTICAL SUPER POWERS for many years, carrying the character and the story within me. I've also launched many film, music, and fashion projects in Europe, one of which was THE EXORCIST - my industrial metal band.  We had a message to bring to the people - the message was salvation from evil and tyranny. The band was on my journey to getting this onto paper and into the public's hands.  That WORLD I created, and its UNIVERSE, will live on in many parallel stories, and THE EXORCIST is the first foray into realizing this vision. My entire music and prayer collection [wav file downloads, 15 CDs total, valued at $90] is my GIFT to all backers. All backers will also be publicly thanked on our social media.

BOOK 1 - EXORCIST & SLAVER

The action takes place on Earth in a timeless dimension. The Exorcist takes form and meets her nemesis, Slaver. Their missions formalize in front of them, but what will they do? Will they do what is easy and pre planned for each, or will they allow their newly beating hearts dictate another way?

The main goal was to join all people and their personal beliefs to fight evil by facing the past and embracing the future. Today I co-founded VUGA Enterprises with Gene Avakyan in order to bring my message to a larger audience.

 

THE EXORCIST - the superhero that I created - a sexy and tough girl fighting evil - is brought to life by an international co-op of artists, illustrators and actors, combining music and exclusive fashions. She will be the star of this series of cosmic proportions - and it all starts with the limited editions of books 1 and 2 (available in this project). These books will actually double the page-count - 48 pages total - containing both the initial rough sketches as well as the finished, full-color pages and cells. Her SUPER POWER consists of being tuned in to the mystical world that most mortals do not have access to. She doesn't want this power thrust upon her, but she must carry her burden and accomplish her mission of fighting evil. She can travel through time and receives new powers as she defeats each evil foe.

She will be facing unique enemies - both visually and spiritually - from demons to gargoyles, to dark archangels, zombies, and even satan himself. On her quest she will get help from angels and light archangels, and spirits and mythological creatures. Her nemesis - SLAVER - controls the power of all the dark forces and is her main enemy. 

Two heroes – of goodness and light, of darkness and evil, will battle for our world.

There has never been a comic quite like this - an EPIC story that will be rendered in an EPIC manner! We will bring all that is good in all faiths into a single force of light, and do so in a stunning fashion.

The first two books have been finalized - read the script and storyline below! As the project continues we will replace parts of the script with images from the artists. After we reach $1,000 in funding, we will show you a rough sketch of the first book! All 94 panels! 

Join us! We will be running lots of social flash mob events around Los Angeles as well, where I will become THE EXORCIST and go out in costume to get the people going. All COSPLAYERS are welcome to join us in LA for these events! This PR campaign will be run for free with collaborators in this project.

Another UNIQUE PERK we offer is to put your face on the character of your choice - you get the chance to become a PART of THE EXORCIST and a part of the storyline for the first two books. Books 1 and 2 are just the beginning! Every character from the zombies to satan himself are OPEN to you (until they are sold out, that is!) .  All freaks are WELCOME! Just how twisted are you???  

If stretch goals are met, your face will remain with the character even in the SOLITAIRE ONLINE GAME  and FUTURE GAMING PROJECTS related to THE EXORCIST. That is something no other comic book funding project EVER offered, as far as we can tell!

BONUS MUSIC LIBRARY

All perk levels include for free the complete Victoria Unikel music library consisting of the following albums:

  • The Exorcist Instrumental (1 CD)
  • The Exorcist 2 CD collection (EN, RU)
  • Russian Orthodox Priest Prayer Recordings (10 CDs)
  • BALANCE Album (1 CD)
  • UNIKEL Album (1CD)

*All backers purchasing perks above the $150 level will receive a mention on Instagram, in a Highlight that will remain up for the duration of the project.

**All backers purchasing perks above the $1,000 level will receive a personal video on Instagram and a copy of the video sent to them.

***All perks that include Book 2, RED HELL, will receive Book 2 if appropriate Stretch Goal ($70,000 level) is met. Otherwise, if this Stretch Goal is not met, the backer will receive an extra copy of Book 1. Please help spread the word so we can jump beyond that Stretch Goal!  Thank you!

STRETCH GOALS

$10,000 STRETCH GOAL - Square-bound Cardstock Cover - a heavier cardstock will be used for your comic book !

$70,000 STRETCH GOAL - At this goal we will send Book 2 to the artists and the printers to get it out into the hands of the backers purchasing appropriate Perk Levels.

$90,000 STRETCH GOAL- CHROMIUM COVER!  All backers will receive their purchased copies of THE EXORCIST with a beautiful shiny chromium enhanced cover!

$100,000 STRETCH GOAL - Gothic Exorcist-styled mobile solitaire card game app will be developed for all participants, featuring the faces of the people who purchased the appropriate custom character PERK.

$150,000 STRETCH GOAL - The team behind THE EXORCIST will make a live appearance with to which all backers will be invited, in the Los Angeles area. This meeting will feature a Q&A section and a chance for all the fans to voice their opinion on the story line and the direction in which they would like the story to go in the future. If you are not in Los Angeles, we will live-stream this conference for your convenience. A special bookmark will be created just for this goal and meeting and will be delivered with each comic book sent to backers. We want to see and hear from all of you!

$250,000 STRETCH GOAL - We will begin development on an RPG (a role-playing game) based on the adventures of THE EXORCIST that will use ELECTRONIC TOKENS we call 'EXORs' for gameplay that will take your EXORCIST experience to the next level!  

$500,000 STRETCH GOAL - The RPG will be READY! All backers will receive a base issue of electronic tokens in proportion to the amount of their backing of our project, to be used in the game. (e.g. - Paid $100 for perks, receive 100 EXORs for gameplay - more info coming)  More details about the game will be available in updates in the coming weeks!

 

THE COMPANY

What is VUGA Enterprises? VUGA is a brand new and growing entertainment company and we burn with desire to bring The Exorcist to the world, along with her arch-nemesis - Slaver. They possess all the powers of the universe and of all faiths and the assistants sent to help them. Our Goals - To create a series of graphic novels with many fantastical heroes and exciting adventures.

Our insane team is moving on with the storyline… We are creating two simultaneous gothic comic novels and, in support of this project, shooting a music video. The Exorcist will appear at random at different spots on the planet. When we reach the appropriate finance goal, we promise to take you along as we hit the comic festival circuit, record and shoot new music projects, all in live video when possible.

We are busy preparing more action, scandal, and surprise for you all! Are you ready for a new class of comics? Then join our team! It’s gonna be a good time. We promise!

 

BOOK 1 - EXORCIST & SLAVER

The action takes place on Earth in a timeless dimension. The Exorcist takes form and meets her nemesis, Slaver. Their missions formalize in front of them, but what will they do? Will they do what is easy and pre planned for each, or will they allow their newly beating hearts dictate another way?  (numbered drawing panels)

  1. Solar eclipse. The sun has gone out.
  2. An odd black smoke is spreading across the desert and the ground has cracked.
  3. Darkness comes and a strong wind picks up.
  4. From the smoke and sand comes a human figure in a long black robe with a large hood pulled up over the head.
  5. Exorcist's face close - I feel the smoke - my eyes do not see well. Who am I? Why am I here?
  6. Light slowly comes back and the wind dies down. "Why is it so hard to move? What world is this?"
  7. The mysterious figure pulls off the hood and opens the robe. "I only remember the beam of light, of soaring high above."
  8. A sexy female body is revealed inside.  "I saw this planet and I saw the people who were there."
  9. "My God, I am human??"
  10. The sun shone brighter. "And light returned to the Earth"
  11. Exorcist screamed in pain. "My chest burns!"
  12. On her chest a flame ignited, and from this flame came a large gold medallion.
  13. Touching her medallion, as if remembering something - "I am the Exorcist and must prevail over the darkness that is taking over on Earth. Why did you give me this mission? Why??!!!!"  
  14. She collapses, drained.  
  15. Evening arrives. "And you shall revel by the sun and by the moon."
  16. Her eyes open. "I was not brought back up, I must battle the forces of darkness here on Earth."
  17. From the sands arise blue bodies of the damned souls.
  18. They all go move the Exorcist, since they were summoned to destroy her. "We will destroy you!"
  19. She swings her braids "My first weapon!"
  20. She destroys them one at a time with the scorpion stinger at ends of her braids, until none of them are standing. "What now, dead fodder? Still think you can destroy me?"
  21. Face close up - "Anyone else want to be made into mince-meat?"
  22. A thin gold ring appears mid-air and floats toward her "Am I engaged all of a sudden?  No, I don't think I'm done having fun!"
  23. The gold ring slides onto her finger "But, if its only a gift, I guess it's ok. Thank you - upstairs!"
  24. An angel, as if summoned, flies to her and stands behind her. "And if this is a helper and not a groom, I guess I'm cool with it."
  25. The Exorcist steps up to the angel "I prefer it up higher"
  26. The angel carries her into the sky "Fly Heavenly Air - the only way to fly!"
  27. They fly toward a city that appears in the distance. “Back to the city. Maybe I can catch a movie. More fun than up in the sky.”
  28. Dark angels begin to appear in the sky. "We are the guardians. You are not allowed here."
  29. Exorcist swings her medallion "But I have a ticket! How do you like it?"
  30. She spins it around her head and it makes the sound "VUUUUGAAAAAAAA"
  31. A cross appears on the medallion. "Be gone in the name of Christ"
  32. The cross starts glowing "and the dark forces shall fall from the site of the holy"
  33. Dark angels collapse to the ground, screaming.
  34. A second golden ring appears and slides on to her finger "You know how we girls love gifts! Golden ones most of all. Any diamonds coming?"
  35. Another angel appears and joins her on her journey.
  36. At the edge of the desert we see horns rise from sand "What in hell?"
  37. A giant human male figure comes out of the sand (big pic) "Who dares disturb me? A rag doll and a couple of insects?"
  38. Close up on Exorcist "You need to learn to be more polite when you address The Exorcist!"
  39. Close up on his head with horns - he speaks: "My name is Azazel. I am master here. This city is mine!"
  40. Exorcist and the angels stop. She speaks - "You have no rights to this city. Leave here or you will die here."
  41. Close up on Exorcist. She speaks - "You have no rights to this city. Leave here or you will die here."
  42. Azazel laughs. "You will kill me? This place has been mine for thousands of years. Leave or you will die yourself."
  43. Exorcist replies: "Ha! Your horns are smarter than your brain, demon! I think I’ll keep them as a souvenir."
  44. Exorcist swings her braids, "Let's see how tough they really are!"
  45. Azazel’s horns fly off his head. "AAAAAA! How dare you?"
  46. The demon screams and there is black blood coming from his head. "I will get you! You have no idea who you are messing with, rag doll!"
  47. He digs himself into the sand "I'm not that easy to kill."
  48. Exorcist points her medallion at the sand and it starts to burn through it, "I think I'll cook you for lunch, you horned toad."
  49. Snakes come from under the ground in giant swarms. "Sssssssss"
  50. They come to rescue Azazel and draw ancient and mystical symbols, writhe around, and kick up a lot of sand. "You will not penetrate the sand."
  51. Exorcist spins her medallion "VUUUUUUUGAAAAAAAA"!
  52. She burns them down with light coming from her cross which replaced the medallion "in the name of the burning light of all that is holy, I command you be gone."
  53. The snakes increase in number "Тhere are more of us than you think."
  54. She yanks on her fishnet stockings and a part comes off  "and I have a surprise for you, dirty rattlers!"
  55. The stocking she pulled off is getting bigger and becoming a giant net. "Ready to go fishing?"
  56. She swings it like a lasso and throws it over all the snakes, pulling it toward her. "SSSSSSSS, we're trapped!  SSSSSSSS It's all over!"
  57. Exorcist squeezes the net and the snakes inside it are shredded "There's a new dish in town - ground demon snake. Who'd like a plate?"
  58. The sun is going down. Sky is getting darker "More guests? When can I finally hit the city and see a movie?"
  59. In the distance appears a handsome young man. "Hmmmm, what a handsome guy.  I'll have to be friendly and meet him. A bit...closer."
  60. Close up он Exorcist's eyes ас they squint "Something is not right. Something is wrong. Where did he come from?"
  61. Exorcist makes a circle with her index fingers and thumbs and looks through it at the young man, “Now I will see your real face!”
  62. She sees his handsome face,. She says "Show your true self",
  63. She sees the young man change before her eyes. His skin changes into a lizard’s scaly skin. "No way. It wasn't a cute guy? This cannot be..."
  64. His eyes are filled with a green glow. "Green eyes...his eyes are....his eyes........Noooooooo!"
  65. His body starts to squirm and writhe, and his spine extends into a tail. (big pic) "You...see... me?  You ... saw … ME!"
  66. A bright flame is ignited in his eyes, "You've waited for this moment for some time. No?"
  67. Exorcist understands that, hiding under his human appearance, who she is really facing. Close up - "SLAVER! the main servant of all the dark forces! You are my enemy and my mission - we will settle this."
  68. She takes her medallion and it displays the main symbol. It glows brighter. "In the name of all that is holy!"
  69. Close up face of Slaver "Hahahahaha"
  70. The servant of hell grows bigger, and has become huge, "You are still far too weak to face me."
  71. Close up The Exorcist's eyes “my powers are waning, but but I have no choice and must accept the duel”.
  72. The Slaver squints his eyes and extends his arms. Steel wings begin to grow out of them."I am stronger than you and will destroy you. Close your eyes NOW!"
  73. Close up on the Exorcist  "NO!"
  74. Suddenly their eyes meet.
  75. Exorcist extends her right hand and it begins to emit a bright light toward the servant. "Let there be light!"
  76. He tilts his head and freezes "Is that the best you can do?"
  77. He feels a heartbeat in his chest, "I have a heart?"
  78. He stops and just observes her. "What a weird feeling - I cannot kill her. I won't be able to go through with it."
  79. She screams - "Fight or I will destroy you where you stand!"
  80. Slaver lowers his wings. "No, I don’t want to. Leave this planet - you won’t survive here. We have risen and will soon take over."
  81. Exorcist cries, "I must kill you to free the Earth!"
  82. Slaver begs "LEAVE!" Close up on his eyes.
  83. He turns and dissolves into the sand. "Farewell"
  84. Exorcist is alone with her two angels. “I’m too weak to defeat the Slaver. He could have killed me, but chose not to… Oh, God!”
  85. Close up: A tear rolls down her cheek. “he...spared my life! What is this feeling in my chest? My heart beats! ”
  86. Close up on her lips "I've heard of love. Is this what it feels like?"
  87. Darkness falls suddenly and a giant clock face appears in sky.
  88. Snakes appear from all around her. “Hisssssssss…”
  89. Giant frightening figure appears out of flames from fissures in the Earth.
  90. “I am Kronos, master of time. You will leave here...NOW!”
  91. Exorcist, close up on face, fear in her eyes. “What? Where?” Lightning and tornadoes are behind her, surrounding her.
  92. Exorcist is pulled into the clock face, screaming. “Noooooooo!”
  93. Moscow Kremlin, the sky is black, gargoyles are sitting perched on the Mausoleum.
  94. Exorcist comes flying from the giant clock face on the Kremlin, followed by her two angels. “ААААААА……..”

BOOK 2 - RED HELL

Synopsis

   The action takes place in a Moscow of 2020. Exorcist is thrown there with her two angels. The country is full of monsters and dark angels, spirits that the common people cannot see.  The epicenter of evil in 2020 is the Kremlin Mausoleum. Lenin rises from his tomb, grows huge, and now has horns on his head. He is the demon Vaal. The curse of blindness was cast on the people of Russia by the demoness Astarta and her helpers Naama and Nega. The demon of laziness, Belfegor, guards all churches. Exorcist kills the gargoyles and Belfegor and receives Archangels Michael and Gabriel. Gabriel fights Astarta and her cohorts. Michael destroys Vaal. The mausoleum explodes and falls into giant chasm, into Satan’s open mouth. Slaver appears in the guise of different people, sometimes a child, sometimes an old woman. He observes the Exorcist from a distance. Exorcist is given new rings and powers and can now blind and strike back with fire. Slaver takes on his natural appearance but starts growing bigger and bigger. Their eyes meet. A command comes from beneath the ground - “KILL”. Slaver, scaly skin and wings, flaps hard and screams at the Exorcist. Seeing that she still lacks the power to fight, and noticing another clock, The Exorcist screams “Kronos!” Kronos appears and the clock on the Kremlin turns into a spiral. Exorcist is pulled into this clock and is ejected in China.
story_txt:
Once in a thousand years, the planets align and a unique solar eclipse signals a game that has been played on this Earth for a hundred thousand years. During this time all the dark forces battle the forces of light for control of Earth and of the minds of its people.The battle comes down to a one-on-one showdown between proxies, one person chosen by each side, to have their memories wiped clean and their minds filled with a single purpose - to destroy each other. The stakes are simple - the lives, minds, and souls of all mankind. These two people have an everlasting title - the forces of good unite behind The EXORCIST, and the others back SLAVER.This, the last Exorcist, is a girl of twenty years, and her nemesis is a boy of about 25. How can one live without context? Without knowledge of a family and loved ones, even with the powers of a superhero? And, in a twist not predicted by the Gods, what if a sliver of consciousness remains? What if these humans, subjugated to fight each other in the colosseum of the Earth, retain some human feeling? What...if...they fall in love? Will their powers be a gift or a curse? That’s why this battle is unique among a thousand such previous bouts. What happens when emotion meets mission, and calling meets a feeling of … kin?THERE'S STRENGTH IN NUMBERS.THEY CAN'T STOP US - JOIN HER FIGHT!I'm Victoria Unikel, and my life has been spent entirely in ENTERTAINMENT. I planned to release this story of a SUPERHERO and a WORLD with MYSTICAL SUPER POWERS for many years, carrying the character and the story within me. I've also launched many film, music, and fashion projects in Europe, one of which was THE EXORCIST - my industrial metal band.  We had a message to bring to the people - the message was salvation from evil and tyranny. The band was on my journey to getting this onto paper and into the public's hands.  That WORLD I created, and its UNIVERSE, will live on in many parallel stories, and THE EXORCIST is the first foray into realizing this vision. My entire music and prayer collection [wav file downloads, 15 CDs total, valued at $90] is my GIFT to all backers. All backers will also be publicly thanked on our social media.BOOK 1 - EXORCIST & SLAVERThe action takes place on Earth in a timeless dimension. The Exorcist takes form and meets her nemesis, Slaver. Their missions formalize in front of them, but what will they do? Will they do what is easy and pre planned for each, or will they allow their newly beating hearts dictate another way?The main goal was to join all people and their personal beliefs to fight evil by facing the past and embracing the future. Today I co-founded VUGA Enterprises with Gene Avakyan in order to bring my message to a larger audience. THE EXORCIST - the superhero that I created - a sexy and tough girl fighting evil - is brought to life by an international co-op of artists, illustrators and actors, combining music and exclusive fashions. She will be the star of this series of cosmic proportions - and it all starts with the limited editions of books 1 and 2 (available in this project). These books will actually double the page-count - 48 pages total - containing both the initial rough sketches as well as the finished, full-color pages and cells. Her SUPER POWER consists of being tuned in to the mystical world that most mortals do not have access to. She doesn't want this power thrust upon her, but she must carry her burden and accomplish her mission of fighting evil. She can travel through time and receives new powers as she defeats each evil foe.She will be facing unique enemies - both visually and spiritually - from demons to gargoyles, to dark archangels, zombies, and even satan himself. On her quest she will get help from angels and light archangels, and spirits and mythological creatures. Her nemesis - SLAVER - controls the power of all the dark forces and is her main enemy. Two heroes – of goodness and light, of darkness and evil, will battle for our world.There has never been a comic quite like this - an EPIC story that will be rendered in an EPIC manner! We will bring all that is good in all faiths into a single force of light, and do so in a stunning fashion.The first two books have been finalized - read the script and storyline below! As the project continues we will replace parts of the script with images from the artists. After we reach $1,000 in funding, we will show you a rough sketch of the first book! All 94 panels! Join us! We will be running lots of social flash mob events around Los Angeles as well, where I will become THE EXORCIST and go out in costume to get the people going. All COSPLAYERS are welcome to join us in LA for these events! This PR campaign will be run for free with collaborators in this project.Another UNIQUE PERK we offer is to put your face on the character of your choice - you get the chance to become a PART of THE EXORCIST and a part of the storyline for the first two books. Books 1 and 2 are just the beginning! Every character from the zombies to satan himself are OPEN to you (until they are sold out, that is!) .  All freaks are WELCOME! Just how twisted are you???  If stretch goals are met, your face will remain with the character even in the SOLITAIRE ONLINE GAME  and FUTURE GAMING PROJECTS related to THE EXORCIST. That is something no other comic book funding project EVER offered, as far as we can tell!BONUS MUSIC LIBRARYAll perk levels include for free the complete Victoria Unikel music library consisting of the following albums:
The Exorcist Instrumental (1 CD)
The Exorcist 2 CD collection (EN, RU)
Russian Orthodox Priest Prayer Recordings (10 CDs)
BALANCE Album (1 CD)
UNIKEL Album (1CD)
*All backers purchasing perks above the $150 level will receive a mention on Instagram, in a Highlight that will remain up for the duration of the project.**All backers purchasing perks above the $1,000 level will receive a personal video on Instagram and a copy of the video sent to them.***All perks that include Book 2, RED HELL, will receive Book 2 if appropriate Stretch Goal ($70,000 level) is met. Otherwise, if this Stretch Goal is not met, the backer will receive an extra copy of Book 1. Please help spread the word so we can jump beyond that Stretch Goal!  Thank you!STRETCH GOALS$10,000 STRETCH GOAL - Square-bound Cardstock Cover - a heavier cardstock will be used for your comic book !$70,000 STRETCH GOAL - At this goal we will send Book 2 to the artists and the printers to get it out into the hands of the backers purchasing appropriate Perk Levels.$90,000 STRETCH GOAL- CHROMIUM COVER!  All backers will receive their purchased copies of THE EXORCIST with a beautiful shiny chromium enhanced cover!$100,000 STRETCH GOAL - Gothic Exorcist-styled mobile solitaire card game app will be developed for all participants, featuring the faces of the people who purchased the appropriate custom character PERK.$150,000 STRETCH GOAL - The team behind THE EXORCIST will make a live appearance with to which all backers will be invited, in the Los Angeles area. This meeting will feature a Q&A section and a chance for all the fans to voice their opinion on the story line and the direction in which they would like the story to go in the future. If you are not in Los Angeles, we will live-stream this conference for your convenience. A special bookmark will be created just for this goal and meeting and will be delivered with each comic book sent to backers. We want to see and hear from all of you!$250,000 STRETCH GOAL - We will begin development on an RPG (a role-playing game) based on the adventures of THE EXORCIST that will use ELECTRONIC TOKENS we call 'EXORs' for gameplay that will take your EXORCIST experience to the next level!  $500,000 STRETCH GOAL - The RPG will be READY! All backers will receive a base issue of electronic tokens in proportion to the amount of their backing of our project, to be used in the game. (e.g. - Paid $100 for perks, receive 100 EXORs for gameplay - more info coming)  More details about the game will be available in updates in the coming weeks! THE COMPANYWhat is VUGA Enterprises? VUGA is a brand new and growing entertainment company and we burn with desire to bring The Exorcist to the world, along with her arch-nemesis - Slaver. They possess all the powers of the universe and of all faiths and the assistants sent to help them. Our Goals - To create a series of graphic novels with many fantastical heroes and exciting adventures.Our insane team is moving on with the storyline… We are creating two simultaneous gothic comic novels and, in support of this project, shooting a music video. The Exorcist will appear at random at different spots on the planet. When we reach the appropriate finance goal, we promise to take you along as we hit the comic festival circuit, record and shoot new music projects, all in live video when possible.We are busy preparing more action, scandal, and surprise for you all! Are you ready for a new class of comics? Then join our team! It’s gonna be a good time. We promise! BOOK 1 - EXORCIST & SLAVERThe action takes place on Earth in a timeless dimension. The Exorcist takes form and meets her nemesis, Slaver. Their missions formalize in front of them, but what will they do? Will they do what is easy and pre planned for each, or will they allow their newly beating hearts dictate another way?  (numbered drawing panels)
Solar eclipse. The sun has gone out.
An odd black smoke is spreading across the desert and the ground has cracked.
Darkness comes and a strong wind picks up.
From the smoke and sand comes a human figure in a long black robe with a large hood pulled up over the head.
Exorcist's face close - I feel the smoke - my eyes do not see well. Who am I? Why am I here?
Light slowly comes back and the wind dies down. "Why is it so hard to move? What world is this?"
The mysterious figure pulls off the hood and opens the robe. "I only remember the beam of light, of soaring high above."
A sexy female body is revealed inside.  "I saw this planet and I saw the people who were there."
"My God, I am human??"
The sun shone brighter. "And light returned to the Earth"
Exorcist screamed in pain. "My chest burns!"
On her chest a flame ignited, and from this flame came a large gold medallion.
Touching her medallion, as if remembering something - "I am the Exorcist and must prevail over the darkness that is taking over on Earth. Why did you give me this mission? Why??!!!!"  
She collapses, drained.  
Evening arrives. "And you shall revel by the sun and by the moon."
Her eyes open. "I was not brought back up, I must battle the forces of darkness here on Earth."
From the sands arise blue bodies of the damned souls.
They all go move the Exorcist, since they were summoned to destroy her. "We will destroy you!"
She swings her braids "My first weapon!"
She destroys them one at a time with the scorpion stinger at ends of her braids, until none of them are standing. "What now, dead fodder? Still think you can destroy me?"
Face close up - "Anyone else want to be made into mince-meat?"
A thin gold ring appears mid-air and floats toward her "Am I engaged all of a sudden?  No, I don't think I'm done having fun!"
The gold ring slides onto her finger "But, if its only a gift, I guess it's ok. Thank you - upstairs!"
An angel, as if summoned, flies to her and stands behind her. "And if this is a helper and not a groom, I guess I'm cool with it."
The Exorcist steps up to the angel "I prefer it up higher"
The angel carries her into the sky "Fly Heavenly Air - the only way to fly!"
They fly toward a city that appears in the distance. “Back to the city. Maybe I can catch a movie. More fun than up in the sky.”
Dark angels begin to appear in the sky. "We are the guardians. You are not allowed here."
Exorcist swings her medallion "But I have a ticket! How do you like it?"
She spins it around her head and it makes the sound "VUUUUGAAAAAAAA"
A cross appears on the medallion. "Be gone in the name of Christ"
The cross starts glowing "and the dark forces shall fall from the site of the holy"
Dark angels collapse to the ground, screaming.
A second golden ring appears and slides on to her finger "You know how we girls love gifts! Golden ones most of all. Any diamonds coming?"
Another angel appears and joins her on her journey.
At the edge of the desert we see horns rise from sand "What in hell?"
A giant human male figure comes out of the sand (big pic) "Who dares disturb me? A rag doll and a couple of insects?"
Close up on Exorcist "You need to learn to be more polite when you address The Exorcist!"
Close up on his head with horns - he speaks: "My name is Azazel. I am master here. This city is mine!"
Exorcist and the angels stop. She speaks - "You have no rights to this city. Leave here or you will die here."
Close up on Exorcist. She speaks - "You have no rights to this city. Leave here or you will die here."
Azazel laughs. "You will kill me? This place has been mine for thousands of years. Leave or you will die yourself."
Exorcist replies: "Ha! Your horns are smarter than your brain, demon! I think I’ll keep them as a souvenir."
Exorcist swings her braids, "Let's see how tough they really are!"
Azazel’s horns fly off his head. "AAAAAA! How dare you?"
The demon screams and there is black blood coming from his head. "I will get you! You have no idea who you are messing with, rag doll!"
He digs himself into the sand "I'm not that easy to kill."
Exorcist points her medallion at the sand and it starts to burn through it, "I think I'll cook you for lunch, you horned toad."
Snakes come from under the ground in giant swarms. "Sssssssss"
They come to rescue Azazel and draw ancient and mystical symbols, writhe around, and kick up a lot of sand. "You will not penetrate the sand."
Exorcist spins her medallion "VUUUUUUUGAAAAAAAA"!
She burns them down with light coming from her cross which replaced the medallion "in the name of the burning light of all that is holy, I command you be gone."
The snakes increase in number "Тhere are more of us than you think."
She yanks on her fishnet stockings and a part comes off  "and I have a surprise for you, dirty rattlers!"
The stocking she pulled off is getting bigger and becoming a giant net. "Ready to go fishing?"
She swings it like a lasso and throws it over all the snakes, pulling it toward her. "SSSSSSSS, we're trapped!  SSSSSSSS It's all over!"
Exorcist squeezes the net and the snakes inside it are shredded "There's a new dish in town - ground demon snake. Who'd like a plate?"
The sun is going down. Sky is getting darker "More guests? When can I finally hit the city and see a movie?"
In the distance appears a handsome young man. "Hmmmm, what a handsome guy.  I'll have to be friendly and meet him. A bit...closer."
Close up он Exorcist's eyes ас they squint "Something is not right. Something is wrong. Where did he come from?"
Exorcist makes a circle with her index fingers and thumbs and looks through it at the young man, “Now I will see your real face!”
She sees his handsome face,. She says "Show your true self",
She sees the young man change before her eyes. His skin changes into a lizard’s scaly skin. "No way. It wasn't a cute guy? This cannot be..."
His eyes are filled with a green glow. "Green eyes...his eyes are....his eyes........Noooooooo!"
His body starts to squirm and writhe, and his spine extends into a tail. (big pic) "You...see... me?  You ... saw … ME!"
A bright flame is ignited in his eyes, "You've waited for this moment for some time. No?"
Exorcist understands that, hiding under his human appearance, who she is really facing. Close up - "SLAVER! the main servant of all the dark forces! You are my enemy and my mission - we will settle this."
She takes her medallion and it displays the main symbol. It glows brighter. "In the name of all that is holy!"
Close up face of Slaver "Hahahahaha"
The servant of hell grows bigger, and has become huge, "You are still far too weak to face me."
Close up The Exorcist's eyes “my powers are waning, but but I have no choice and must accept the duel”.
The Slaver squints his eyes and extends his arms. Steel wings begin to grow out of them."I am stronger than you and will destroy you. Close your eyes NOW!"
Close up on the Exorcist  "NO!"
Suddenly their eyes meet.
Exorcist extends her right hand and it begins to emit a bright light toward the servant. "Let there be light!"
He tilts his head and freezes "Is that the best you can do?"
He feels a heartbeat in his chest, "I have a heart?"
He stops and just observes her. "What a weird feeling - I cannot kill her. I won't be able to go through with it."
She screams - "Fight or I will destroy you where you stand!"
Slaver lowers his wings. "No, I don’t want to. Leave this planet - you won’t survive here. We have risen and will soon take over."
Exorcist cries, "I must kill you to free the Earth!"
Slaver begs "LEAVE!" Close up on his eyes.
He turns and dissolves into the sand. "Farewell"
Exorcist is alone with her two angels. “I’m too weak to defeat the Slaver. He could have killed me, but chose not to… Oh, God!”
Close up: A tear rolls down her cheek. “he...spared my life! What is this feeling in my chest? My heart beats! ”
Close up on her lips "I've heard of love. Is this what it feels like?"
Darkness falls suddenly and a giant clock face appears in sky.
Snakes appear from all around her. “Hisssssssss…”
Giant frightening figure appears out of flames from fissures in the Earth.
“I am Kronos, master of time. You will leave here...NOW!”
Exorcist, close up on face, fear in her eyes. “What? Where?” Lightning and tornadoes are behind her, surrounding her.
Exorcist is pulled into the clock face, screaming. “Noooooooo!”
Moscow Kremlin, the sky is black, gargoyles are sitting perched on the Mausoleum.
Exorcist comes flying from the giant clock face on the Kremlin, followed by her two angels. “ААААААА……..”
BOOK 2 - RED HELLSynopsis   The action takes place in a Moscow of 2020. Exorcist is thrown there with her two angels. The country is full of monsters and dark angels, spirits that the common people cannot see.  The epicenter of evil in 2020 is the Kremlin Mausoleum. Lenin rises from his tomb, grows huge, and now has horns on his head. He is the demon Vaal. The curse of blindness was cast on the people of Russia by the demoness Astarta and her helpers Naama and Nega. The demon of laziness, Belfegor, guards all churches. Exorcist kills the gargoyles and Belfegor and receives Archangels Michael and Gabriel. Gabriel fights Astarta and her cohorts. Michael destroys Vaal. The mausoleum explodes and falls into giant chasm, into Satan’s open mouth. Slaver appears in the guise of different people, sometimes a child, sometimes an old woman. He observes the Exorcist from a distance. Exorcist is given new rings and powers and can now blind and strike back with fire. Slaver takes on his natural appearance but starts growing bigger and bigger. Their eyes meet. A command comes from beneath the ground - “KILL”. Slaver, scaly skin and wings, flaps hard and screams at the Exorcist. Seeing that she still lacks the power to fight, and noticing another clock, The Exorcist screams “Kronos!” Kronos appears and the clock on the Kremlin turns into a spiral. Exorcist is pulled into this clock and is ejected in China.

story:
Hi everyone!
My name is Bill Cunningham and if you’re into comics (who isn’t?) you may have heard of me and my company, Pulp 2.0.    We’ve been successful in restoring, redesigning and republishing classic comics and pulp like Graham Nolan’s MONSTER ISLAND,  John Wooley & Terry Tidwell’s TWILIGHT AVENGER, Chris Ecker & Gary Carlson’s BIG BANG COMICS COLLECTION and Don Glut’s NEW ADVENTURES OF FRANKENSTEIN COLLECTION.  

The Pulp 2.0 brand has always been to reclaim the best of the past, and to seek out the pulp that fans haven’t seen before, but should.  Over the past year I’ve been reaching out to creators and fans in other countries to find the sort of comics entertainment that fans can’t get in the USA. Comics with a reputation for quality pulp entertainment. Comics that go for the throat.  That’s why I want to introduce you to KILLER - a terrific comic book series from Chile.

KILLER is just the sort of project that ticks all of the boxes:   It’s a comic we haven’t seen before in the United States (or English-speaking countries for that matter), it’s not the usual superhero fare - it’s a spy action-adventure book, and it’s well crafted. KILLER is a comic that speaks to the hard-hitting, raw, action entertainment of the 1970’s - so much so that its lead character looks like Charles Bronson!!!!  



Gabler, the artist of the Chilean original 1960’s JAMES BOND 007  comics published by Zig-Zag, created KILLER to continue the spy action of the 007 comics, but with a rougher edge in both story and character. The stories featured the adventures of a man code-named "Jack Killer", a British secret agent and ladies man with the rough hewn look of Charles Bronson.  Jack Killer acts to thwart conspiracies and attacks by the KGB and Tarantula - a global criminal cartel.  If you like Matt Helm, Callan and Harry Palmer - then you’re going to like the distinctive, two-fisted flavor of KILLER.   The character lives up to his name.

In 1974, nine KILLER stories were originally published in Chile and Argentina. However Chile’s inflation under the Pinochet government was so volatile, the price of everything changed from week to week and decimated the comics industry. One KILLER story remained in Gabler's desk until 2017. With the help of some new artists he completed the story and cover for Acciòn Comics. The restored comic was welcomed by Chilean fans and the international media; with stories published in Brazil, Mexico, Ecuador and the Netherlands.

 

But let’s face it - KILLER is a comic that is over 43 years old!  It’s going to take a lot of sweat and talent to restore the artwork.  To accomplish this, I’m partnering with Acciòn Comics to scan all of the original artwork, and translate it to English.   It’s a job that will cover over 320+ pages of material - and that doesn’t include the covers, and backmatter from the original comics.  That’s where we need your help - financing the number of artists and hours it is going to take to scan all of the artwork that was rescued from Germàn Gabler’s basement, provide a basic English translation of the comic in a format for me to edit and enhance, and develop behind-the-scenes material from the original comics and reference files.

  

But even though it's a lot of work - make no mistake, KILLER is a comic worth pursuing.

Our Goal is simple:  Raise $6,000 to cover the following costs -

  • Scanning all of the original 320+ pages of artwork that we’ve rescued from rotting.
  • Use Photoshop and Illustrator to fix the artwork as necessary so we have clean art to work from.
  • Re-letter the 320+ comic scans / Adobe Illustrator files into English.
  • Polish that rough English translation so that it reads and flows well.


This $6,000 amount allows us to publish five issues of a cool 64-page Black & White comic like the pages you see here. That's our primary focus. However we don’t want to stop there. We have stretch goals we would like to hit in order to develop a bigger comic book release, and develop and expand KILLER into other media:
 
  • Hitting our stretch goal of $11,000 unlocks an agreement for new KILLER comic covers by noted artist CHRISTOPHER SHY of Studio Ronin .


     
  • Hitting our stretch goal of $18,000 unlocks production of A COLOR COLLECTION of the entire series as well as bonus material.
     
  • Hitting our stretch goal of $25,000 means there will be NEW KILLER media such as ebooks, and more comics. We are already in talks with artists and writers to develop this whole new world of Killer. 

We can’t thank you enough for contributing to this campaign. A successful restoration of the comic and a launch of the comic series will allow us to tell further KILLER tales, and will help us open the borders to find more comics and pulp from around the world and bring them to English-speaking audiences.  You’ll be part of a movement to deliver more comics more often, and broaden the spectrum of comics available to fans. We’re already bringing horror comics from Spain over for you to enjoy, and we have many other contacts around the globe.


We are designing fun perks for your contribution to this campaign!

Take a look at the right hand side of this page, to see what we have to offer you for your contribution to this restoration project! We have a bit of everything from buttons, stickers, PDFs of the comics to posters and even original artwork.



Pulp 2.0 has a history of reclaiming comics and publishing them for new readers to enjoy.   Here’s what fans have to say about our books when reviewing them on Amazon:

“The Frankenstein Monster, returns  in Donald F. Glut’s NEW ADVENTURES OF FRANKENSTEIN. Finally in circulation again through Pulp 2.0, this massive 730-page edition collects the first half of Glut’s Frankenstein saga, revised and updated, along with a look into its history, enduring appeal, and photos from the writer’s own extensive collection.” - Donald C. Weiss Jr.

“Thank goodness Pulp 2.0 has the intelligence to reproduce some of the finest comic stories I've ever had the privilege of reading. I hope they eventually reprint the entire run. They've definitely got a dedicated customer...” - doctorwholittle

“I’d never heard of THE TWILIGHT AVENGER until Pulp 2.0 put out this volume reprinting the first issues of the original comic . Along with excellent reproduction of the original inked pages, the book contains plenty of extras, some of which is being printed for the first time. Like Pulp 2.0's previous efforts I have purchased (Knight Watchman: Golden Age and Thunder Girl Digest), this volume is lovingly-crafted with the care and attention to detail that bespeaks the publishers genuine love for the material.” - Charles Barnard

“The two volumes in this series collect all of Glut's NEW ADVENTURES OF FRANKENSTEIN books and they are well worth your time. Plus, you get a brand new novel, 'The Final Horror', which finishes up the series and boy, was it worth the wait. Like a Universal/Hammer horror film on the printed page...and everything you want in a Frankenstein story.  Vol One was a blast and Vol Two is even better.” - Charles R. Rutledge (A HELL WITHIN, CONGREGATIONS OF THE DEAD)

“With this enigmatic character, writer Michael Patrick Sullivan has created a truly original hero but with all the trappings of traditional pulp action.  Kudos to publisher Bill Cunningham and Pulp 2.0 for collecting these stories in a terrific paperback you don't want to miss. This reviewer is hoping we haven't seen the last of THE AUSLANDER FILES.” - Ron Fortier (THE GREEN HORNET,  BROTHER BONES, DAUGHTER OF DRACULA)

Bringing KILLER to English-speaking audiences is going to be a challenge - from scanning and restoring all of the old artwork properly, to providing an authentic translation that doesn’t seem awkward, to assembling a coherent design package befitting ‘Jack Killer’ -  there is a lot to do.  However, as you can see, Pulp 2.0 has a strong history of creating great books that fans want in their collections.  Here’s our plan on how to get this done for KILLER:

Acciòn Comics and Pulp 2.0 have partnered in this venture and are committed to restoring all of the artwork.  Acciòn has the experience and has already completed the lost 10th story Gabler had stashed in his desk. The comic was released in Chile to great acclaim throughout S. America.  They will provide clean, high resolution scans of the other 9 stories so I can begin design work on the comics.

 

I will be handling the rewrites on the translation making sure that this comic is a KILLER read.  Translations and lettering are Adobe Illustrator files, and I will be able to edit both quickly and consistently.  This is how Pulp 2.0 has been able to republish other comics - we keep - redesigning, rethinking, reclaiming - until we get the whole package “right.”  

The Acciòn Comics team with Gabler!

Once we reach our initial goal, we will design the new comic covers using artwork from the comic itself.  This will maintain the look and attitude of the series. If we reach our projected stretch goals we will open up a whole new world with MOVIE POSTER-like covers from artist Christopher Shy / Studio Ronin.  He created the cover art to our upcoming TALES OF FRANKENSTEIN graphic novel. We are quite excited about reaching our goal for him to come aboard and take KILLER to the next level. This can only happen if you become involved.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know it’s tough out there.  We know everyone doesn’t have deep pockets.  But the fact is when we win, you win. When you contribute to KILLER you’re contributing to preserving our pulp culture; to opening the doors to new stories and art; to sharing the best of yesteryear with your fellow fans.  Please, no matter what, SHARE this campaign with your friends who you think might like this project. They could be action movie fans, Charles Bronson fans, spy-fi fans, or just comic fans. Please help us raise awareness of this cool comic !
story_txt:
Hi everyone!My name is Bill Cunningham and if you’re into comics (who isn’t?) you may have heard of me and my company, Pulp 2.0.    We’ve been successful in restoring, redesigning and republishing classic comics and pulp like Graham Nolan’s MONSTER ISLAND,  John Wooley & Terry Tidwell’s TWILIGHT AVENGER, Chris Ecker & Gary Carlson’s BIG BANG COMICS COLLECTION and Don Glut’s NEW ADVENTURES OF FRANKENSTEIN COLLECTION.  The Pulp 2.0 brand has always been to reclaim the best of the past, and to seek out the pulp that fans haven’t seen before, but should.  Over the past year I’ve been reaching out to creators and fans in other countries to find the sort of comics entertainment that fans can’t get in the USA. Comics with a reputation for quality pulp entertainment. Comics that go for the throat.  That’s why I want to introduce you to KILLER - a terrific comic book series from Chile.
KILLER is just the sort of project that ticks all of the boxes:   It’s a comic we haven’t seen before in the United States (or English-speaking countries for that matter), it’s not the usual superhero fare - it’s a spy action-adventure book, and it’s well crafted. KILLER is a comic that speaks to the hard-hitting, raw, action entertainment of the 1970’s - so much so that its lead character looks like Charles Bronson!!!!  Gabler, the artist of the Chilean original 1960’s JAMES BOND 007  comics published by Zig-Zag, created KILLER to continue the spy action of the 007 comics, but with a rougher edge in both story and character. The stories featured the adventures of a man code-named "Jack Killer", a British secret agent and ladies man with the rough hewn look of Charles Bronson.  Jack Killer acts to thwart conspiracies and attacks by the KGB and Tarantula - a global criminal cartel.  If you like Matt Helm, Callan and Harry Palmer - then you’re going to like the distinctive, two-fisted flavor of KILLER.   The character lives up to his name.

In 1974, nine KILLER stories were originally published in Chile and Argentina. However Chile’s inflation under the Pinochet government was so volatile, the price of everything changed from week to week and decimated the comics industry. One KILLER story remained in Gabler's desk until 2017. With the help of some new artists he completed the story and cover for Acciòn Comics. The restored comic was welcomed by Chilean fans and the international media; with stories published in Brazil, Mexico, Ecuador and the Netherlands.
 But let’s face it - KILLER is a comic that is over 43 years old!  It’s going to take a lot of sweat and talent to restore the artwork.  To accomplish this, I’m partnering with Acciòn Comics to scan all of the original artwork, and translate it to English.   It’s a job that will cover over 320+ pages of material - and that doesn’t include the covers, and backmatter from the original comics.  That’s where we need your help - financing the number of artists and hours it is going to take to scan all of the artwork that was rescued from Germàn Gabler’s basement, provide a basic English translation of the comic in a format for me to edit and enhance, and develop behind-the-scenes material from the original comics and reference files.  But even though it's a lot of work - make no mistake, KILLER is a comic worth pursuing.

Our Goal is simple:  Raise $6,000 to cover the following costs -

Scanning all of the original 320+ pages of artwork that we’ve rescued from rotting.
Use Photoshop and Illustrator to fix the artwork as necessary so we have clean art to work from.
Re-letter the 320+ comic scans / Adobe Illustrator files into English.
Polish that rough English translation so that it reads and flows well.


This $6,000 amount allows us to publish five issues of a cool 64-page Black & White comic like the pages you see here. That's our primary focus. However we don’t want to stop there. We have stretch goals we would like to hit in order to develop a bigger comic book release, and develop and expand KILLER into other media: 

Hitting our stretch goal of $11,000 unlocks an agreement for new KILLER comic covers by noted artist CHRISTOPHER SHY of Studio Ronin . 

Hitting our stretch goal of $18,000 unlocks production of A COLOR COLLECTION of the entire series as well as bonus material. 

Hitting our stretch goal of $25,000 means there will be NEW KILLER media such as ebooks, and more comics. We are already in talks with artists and writers to develop this whole new world of Killer. 

We can’t thank you enough for contributing to this campaign. A successful restoration of the comic and a launch of the comic series will allow us to tell further KILLER tales, and will help us open the borders to find more comics and pulp from around the world and bring them to English-speaking audiences.  You’ll be part of a movement to deliver more comics more often, and broaden the spectrum of comics available to fans. We’re already bringing horror comics from Spain over for you to enjoy, and we have many other contacts around the globe.We are designing fun perks for your contribution to this campaign! 

Take a look at the right hand side of this page, to see what we have to offer you for your contribution to this restoration project! We have a bit of everything from buttons, stickers, PDFs of the comics to posters and even original artwork.Pulp 2.0 has a history of reclaiming comics and publishing them for new readers to enjoy.   Here’s what fans have to say about our books when reviewing them on Amazon:“The Frankenstein Monster, returns  in Donald F. Glut’s NEW ADVENTURES OF FRANKENSTEIN. Finally in circulation again through Pulp 2.0, this massive 730-page edition collects the first half of Glut’s Frankenstein saga, revised and updated, along with a look into its history, enduring appeal, and photos from the writer’s own extensive collection.” - Donald C. Weiss Jr.“Thank goodness Pulp 2.0 has the intelligence to reproduce some of the finest comic stories I've ever had the privilege of reading. I hope they eventually reprint the entire run. They've definitely got a dedicated customer...” - doctorwholittle“I’d never heard of THE TWILIGHT AVENGER until Pulp 2.0 put out this volume reprinting the first issues of the original comic . Along with excellent reproduction of the original inked pages, the book contains plenty of extras, some of which is being printed for the first time. Like Pulp 2.0's previous efforts I have purchased (Knight Watchman: Golden Age and Thunder Girl Digest), this volume is lovingly-crafted with the care and attention to detail that bespeaks the publishers genuine love for the material.” - Charles Barnard“The two volumes in this series collect all of Glut's NEW ADVENTURES OF FRANKENSTEIN books and they are well worth your time. Plus, you get a brand new novel, 'The Final Horror', which finishes up the series and boy, was it worth the wait. Like a Universal/Hammer horror film on the printed page...and everything you want in a Frankenstein story.  Vol One was a blast and Vol Two is even better.” - Charles R. Rutledge (A HELL WITHIN, CONGREGATIONS OF THE DEAD)“With this enigmatic character, writer Michael Patrick Sullivan has created a truly original hero but with all the trappings of traditional pulp action.  Kudos to publisher Bill Cunningham and Pulp 2.0 for collecting these stories in a terrific paperback you don't want to miss. This reviewer is hoping we haven't seen the last of THE AUSLANDER FILES.” - Ron Fortier (THE GREEN HORNET,  BROTHER BONES, DAUGHTER OF DRACULA)
Bringing KILLER to English-speaking audiences is going to be a challenge - from scanning and restoring all of the old artwork properly, to providing an authentic translation that doesn’t seem awkward, to assembling a coherent design package befitting ‘Jack Killer’ -  there is a lot to do.  However, as you can see, Pulp 2.0 has a strong history of creating great books that fans want in their collections.  Here’s our plan on how to get this done for KILLER:Acciòn Comics and Pulp 2.0 have partnered in this venture and are committed to restoring all of the artwork.  Acciòn has the experience and has already completed the lost 10th story Gabler had stashed in his desk. The comic was released in Chile to great acclaim throughout S. America.  They will provide clean, high resolution scans of the other 9 stories so I can begin design work on the comics.  I will be handling the rewrites on the translation making sure that this comic is a KILLER read.  Translations and lettering are Adobe Illustrator files, and I will be able to edit both quickly and consistently.  This is how Pulp 2.0 has been able to republish other comics - we keep - redesigning, rethinking, reclaiming - until we get the whole package “right.”  
 The Acciòn Comics team with Gabler!Once we reach our initial goal, we will design the new comic covers using artwork from the comic itself.  This will maintain the look and attitude of the series. If we reach our projected stretch goals we will open up a whole new world with MOVIE POSTER-like covers from artist Christopher Shy / Studio Ronin.  He created the cover art to our upcoming TALES OF FRANKENSTEIN graphic novel. We are quite excited about reaching our goal for him to come aboard and take KILLER to the next level. This can only happen if you become involved. 

Other Ways You Can Help
We know it’s tough out there.  We know everyone doesn’t have deep pockets.  But the fact is when we win, you win. When you contribute to KILLER you’re contributing to preserving our pulp culture; to opening the doors to new stories and art; to sharing the best of yesteryear with your fellow fans.  Please, no matter what, SHARE this campaign with your friends who you think might like this project. They could be action movie fans, Charles Bronson fans, spy-fi fans, or just comic fans. Please help us raise awareness of this cool comic !

story:
Short Summary

We are a collective of diverse LGBTQ+A individuals who are passionate about bringing our colourful stories to the community & share with the world at large. In comic form!

Straight In was the story that started it all. Inspired by true-to-life events, with a flair of embellishment & a healthy dose of gay humor, Straight In follows Nina as she's thrust from her quiet, engaged life in the UK into a world of self-discovery & inhibition in downtown Toronto, after inheriting her late uncle's house.

From there, we spun-off Agent Undisclothed. An account of Nina's late uncle Lou's adventures as a cold war era super-spy ...in drag. Agent Undisclothed takes the embellishment of SI, sprinkles it with historical accuracy, & smothers it in suspenseful glee. That's right: Drag, Spies, Hilarity, & ...Soviets? Why not?

What can you help us with? We are preparing to launch our first-ever cross-over series. That's right! Nina's life & the world of uncle Lou are about to collide! ...But we need your help to keep their stories going!

What We Need & What You Get

We've managed 7x Straight In & 4x Agent Undisclothed issues, 1 graphic novel & distribution in2 comic books. But we're nearing the end of our ability to fund our vision out of love. We need your help to bring Nina, uncle Lou, & the world together - & keep their stories growing!

We've collected a selection of special & unique gifts ranging from Straight In/Agent Undisclothed buttons & keychains, to original artboards, prints, & even being featured in upcoming issues (of whichever timeline you'd like)!

The Impact

Our goal is $5K (CAD). With this we hope to offset costs of our upcoming SI/AU Team-Up launch event at a locally owned & operated LGBTQA business.

This includes critical things such as:

  • Printing of the latest issue
  • Costumes for our self-performed live action intro skit
  • Payment of certain talent, such as the time of our illustrator & local drag queens
  • Providing peace of mind Straight In & Agent Undisclothed can continue in earnest

...And did we mention, it's CAD? Like, Canadian dollars?

Risks & Challenges

We're going to be honest... we've supported as much as we can on a personal level. Some of us have contributed savings, some of us have dedicated time away from our families or day jobs. But all of us are willing to contribute everything we can.

  • We believe in our stories & their ability to bridge between common LGBTQA challenges & experiences, with light-hearted humor
  • We have been doing this for a few years - we may be low on our personal contributions, but we are not out of passion
  • We know what we're doing, & have come this far in just a couple short years
    • In less than  3 years, we've managed regular issues, 2 storylines, & distrubution in a couple local shops - with a little more resources, we could bring our stories to LGBTQA people beyond our local community

Other Ways You Can Help

Financial assistance can be a huge help - but that's not the only way you can help us out! We appreciate help from anybody who wants to bring the magic of Straight In &/or Agent Undisclothed further! Here are some ideas. :)

  • Share this campaign with your friends & family
  • Visit our website & online store for merch & digital copies of our issues! (https://straightinpublications.com)
  • Follow us on Instagram! (@straightinpublications)
  • Come support our our Team-Up launch event @ Pegasus on Church in Toronto! (October, 19'19)

story:
The Gilded Age is about a group of performers, the Branning Troupe. Half actors and half carnival folk, the group travels throughout the countries of Victorian Era Europe. For some it offers a direction to their lives, others get the adoration of the crowds, and the rest find simple refuge from a world which has cast them out.

The plan for The Gilded Age came from an image of a western style gunfighter with a mechanical arm. Immediately my mind started scrambling with thoughts of a Steampunk world approaching a crossroads of not only technology and magic but of the direction the world would take. Amongst that loose backdrop, I set the characters of Hanna and Elias on a mission to save King and country.

However, that is the type of plan which requires a readership. In this day and age to ask potential readers to buy into an unknown story/creator is a difficult proposition. To hope that they stick around for a four-issue story-arc... I wasn't sure.

I rethought the plan, reworked the story, and came up with something bigger, yet easier to digest. Each story would be done-in-one. They would tell stories that could be enjoyed by anyone picking up a random issue. The issues would have overlapping characters, but by and large, each issue would focus on one or a pair of characters.

The key would be that I was slowly building up my world. And making the readers care about various characters by giving each the screen time they deserved. And by doing this I allowed for different types of stories within the same world. Whether that is Western or Horror or a Heist or something Fantastical, the hope has always been to build the world from the character's eyes rather than try and hit you with one thousand years of history.

We've collected all four issues into this Volume One with an amazing brand new cover from La'Vata O'Neal.

 

 Get a free PDF copy of the first issue by clicking here!

 

 

 

 Get a free PDF copy of the first issue by clicking here!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Thank you for taking the time to view the project. I'm excited for the opportunity to share The Gilded Age with you.

 

Risks & Challenges

The Gilded Age has successfully ran a crowdfunding campaign in order to get the very first print run. Due to this initial order, I will have no problem fulfilling any additional orders from this campaign. The target date for getting those books back from the printer is April 2018.
