story:
Strangelove Octopus..

Strangelove Octopus is a science fiction comic book saga.

Alien Invasions.. Government cover ups.. A Civil War between  Religion and Technology.. an Expedition to the Garden of Eden.. Conspiracies.. Teeth and Tentacles!!

  • I am david skeleton and I am the writer and illustrator for this comic book project.  I am putting together this introductory issue with a projected release in January 2020, allowing time for printing the physical comic book, and shipping following this campaign.
  • I am launching this project with  an introductory issue.  I am pushing this campaign through the month of October and will be updating  Inktober sketches that will be focused around this project, as well as sharing the progress of this first issue. This issue will have introductory storylines bringing you into the world of Strangelove Octopus,  as well as a Bunch of Extras!!
  • I am so excited about this project, and over this past year I have written this project with a series of sketches that outline this project saga through the next couple years.  I am very excited about launching this project through the month of October and sharing with you sketches and drawings that will help introduce this vast world of Strangelove Octopus!!

 

This is a LIMITED print run and will only be available for a limited time for an audience that wants to help support this project!!  I have been putting together a lot of content that will open your eyes to this world of Strangelove Octopus, revealing alien invasions, and government cover ups, and conspiracies, as well as more teeth and tentacles!!

With your help and support I will be able to print a physical copy of this comic book, as well as a digital release.  Following this campaign I will be able to print and ship these comics to you.  Thank you so much for all of your support!!

 

Thank you so much for your support!!  With your support we can make this project a reality!!

Even more..

  • I am looking at around 2500 dollars to print this Ashcan copy which is an introductory issue that will open your eyes to Strangelove Octopus, a science fiction comic book saga that follows along the truth behind every conspiracy since even before the Garden of Eden.  This story tells of wars and ruins, and alien invasions, abductions and of prophecies of the end of the world almost as soon as it ever existed.
  • Not only will I be completely grateful for all of the support this campaign receives, I will be offering even more than just an ashcan copy of this story!!  I will be setting up rewards for this support that include signed books, sketches,  and original art!!  I will have digital downloads available as well as other promotional content, depending on the extent of this campaign.  I will be including extra stretch goals as well!!
  • Depending on how this campaign follows through I will adapt with stretch goals or minimize accordingly.  It will still go towards the launch of this project, especially towards a smaller print run if the campaign does not reach its goal.  With your support we can make this happen!!  I am so excited about this project, and I hope that you are as well!!

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not help financially with this project I hope that you still follow along and see the progress of this comic book project!!  I am so very excited about putting this all together, and I have been sharing this progress throughout various social media platforms including Wordpress, Facebook, Patreon, Instagram, and on and on..  helping spread the word about this comic project is just as important, and helpful.  So I appreciate any support that I can get to make this comic book project a reality!!  Whether it is sharing this campaign, or liking and sharing my Facebook page, or following along on my Wordpress blog!!  All of it is just as important and helpful.

Thank you so much for stopping here and checking this all out!!  And thank you for sharing any of the content from any of the social media platforms.  Thank you for all of your help to make this a reality!!

Please feel free to comment and let me know what you think, and let me know what you would like to see here through this Indiegogo Campaign and please please please help get the word out and share it with the world!!

Thank you so much for stopping here and checking this all out!!  And thank you for sharing any of the content from any of the social media platforms.  Thank you for all of your help to make this a reality!!
Please feel free to comment and let me know what you think, and let me know what you would like to see here through this Indiegogo Campaign and please please please help get the word out and share it with the world!!

story:
Our Story

Hi! I’m Ariel, I am a tech designer, author, coach, artist, and most importantly, a mom. I grew up collecting beach glass as a girl during the summers. It brought me so much joy to find that glistening treasure among the shells. It’s where the idea for the Lumins came from! Who are the Lumins you ask? I’d be delighted to share!

My daughters and I want to bring a 120 page children's graphic novel, Kora Kelly and the Life Keeper into the world and get it published! Its Book 1 in the Glimmer Series.

The protagonist is Kora Kelly, a small yet mighty underwater creature called a Lumin. Lumins live in a self-created glass bulbs protected by sea foam on the Jetty along the shores of the ocean. The Lumins deliver sea glass to humans, or, at least they did, until Sarwen, the angry crab started cleaning up the ocean shoreline because he was tired of the mess that humans left behind. Kora must journey to stop Sarwen from disrupting the imbalance between the worlds. 

The story begins when Kora cannot figure out how to turn off her glow. The Lumin's are able to glow, but they are so small that they often control their glow so that they do not get eaten by predators. Kora begins a journey to find out why she cannot turn off her glow. The Life Keeper is a magical necklace that Kora is entrusted with on her quest to help save Lumin glass. Along the way, Kora discovers more about her own special powers.

The book is filled with playful prose, a few Lumin songs and lots of light hearted magical twists and turns! 

The Glimmer Series of underwater children's graphic novels aims to create sparkles in the hearts of parents and children worldwide and to raise awareness to be empowered to take inspired action to clean and protect our planet's oceans. 

What started as a book quickly turned into a room in our home called the Luminarium, where we created the storyboard for the book and put it all along the wall.

Now, we need to fund the illustrations to bring the book to life and we need your help! We estimate about six months to create the full 120 page graphic novel.

The Team

Author, Artist and Creative Director, and mom, Ariel Grace is a tech design leader, a coach for creatives and recently launched a podcast/YouTube show called Creatively Free where she talks about creative freedom and offers art and meditations. She'll be promoting the journey of this book through the podcast.

Illustrator and Graphic Designer, Miah Serdone is a full time brand and graphic designer. 

Nine-year-old Siena keeps the joy of the Lumins alive in our home and our life! She adores them and wants to share the magic with other children worldwide! She particularly loves the side-kick Fuzzmons, who help Kora find Sarwen's castle.

Thirteen-year-old Sydney has painted Lumin worlds for years and is a big help with creating meaningful cliffhangers and plot twists!

Check out an early rendition of the world brought to life.

Here are some examples of the Lumin original watercolor painting artwork by Ariel available for sale.

What We Need & What You Get

Here’s where the funds will go: 

70% will go to completing the illustrations and layouts, book cover

10% will be in editing and publishing

20% will be in merchandise and shipping 

My daughters are so excited to make custom art and thank you notes for contributors, fuzzmon keychains and more! 

If we reach more than our goal amount: 

It breaks my heart that our oceans are full of trash. I’ve donated over the years, and picked up trash, but I want to help more and I’ve woven this challenge into the storyline.

One we reach our first goal, 20% of all remaining funds will go to:

The Ocean Clean Up project

Additional funds will go to illustrations for Book 2 in the series!

The Impact

What's next for the Lumins after Book 1? Kora has many more adventures ahead. We want to publish at least two more books in the Glimmer Series. Eventually, it is my dream to have it made into an animated film series. Each book will help to create new myths in our narrative about the complexity and challenges of our time when things are not just good or evil, black or white. It will also bring more attention and funds to social issues and eco challenges through the lens of a playful children’s perspective. 

It's also my desire that children will learn to grow up embracing their unique glow and special gifts in the world, and that parents will encourage them. As a child, I was a sensitive one that loved creating imaginal worlds. As an adult, I’d love to find ways to restore and honor the magic of the planet. 

Risks & Challenges

This will be my first time publishing a graphic novel, though I have published and co-authored other books before. The main risk is that we will not raise enough funds to finish the illustrations and therefore publish the first edition. That’s where you come in…

Other Ways You Can Help: Social Sharing Contest!

If you can't contribute with a donation, here’s other ways you can help:

From now until April 6, 2021 you can participate in the social sharing contest for parents/kids to be entered into a drawing to win a Lumin poster!

Here’s how to enter:

1. Parents/Kids: Print out this coloring page 

2. Kids: Color your best, most creative way

3. Parents: Have your parents post your entry on social media on Facebook, Instagram or TikTok with the hashtag #ilovelumins and Share the link to the Indegogo campaign https://igg.me/at/glimmerseries

Official Contest Rules

Otherwise simply spread the word. Tell other parents, teachers, schools, kids and friends about the book and spread the word far and wide! 

Use the Indegogo share tools to share our campaign! Share: https://igg.me/at/glimmerseries

The Life Keeper is a magical necklace that Kora is entrusted with on her quest to help save Lumin glass. Along the way, Kora discovers more about her own special powers.The book is filled with playful prose, a few Lumin songs and lots of light hearted magical twists and turns! The Glimmer Series of underwater children's graphic novels aims to create sparkles in the hearts of parents and children worldwide and to raise awareness to be empowered to take inspired action to clean and protect our planet's oceans. What started as a book quickly turned into a room in our home called the Luminarium, where we created the storyboard for the book and put it all along the wall.Now, we need to fund the illustrations to bring the book to life and we need your help! We estimate about six months to create the full 120 page graphic novel.The TeamAuthor, Artist and Creative Director, and mom, Ariel Grace is a tech design leader, a coach for creatives and recently launched a podcast/YouTube show called Creatively Free where she talks about creative freedom and offers art and meditations. She'll be promoting the journey of this book through the podcast.Illustrator and Graphic Designer, Miah Serdone is a full time brand and graphic designer. Nine-year-old Siena keeps the joy of the Lumins alive in our home and our life! She adores them and wants to share the magic with other children worldwide! She particularly loves the side-kick Fuzzmons, who help Kora find Sarwen's castle.Thirteen-year-old Sydney has painted Lumin worlds for years and is a big help with creating meaningful cliffhangers and plot twists!Check out an early rendition of the world brought to life.Here are some examples of the Lumin original watercolor painting artwork by Ariel available for sale.What We Need & What You GetHere’s where the funds will go: 70% will go to completing the illustrations and layouts, book cover10% will be in editing and publishing20% will be in merchandise and shipping My daughters are so excited to make custom art and thank you notes for contributors, fuzzmon keychains and more! If we reach more than our goal amount: It breaks my heart that our oceans are full of trash. I’ve donated over the years, and picked up trash, but I want to help more and I’ve woven this challenge into the storyline.One we reach our first goal, 20% of all remaining funds will go to:The Ocean Clean Up projectAdditional funds will go to illustrations for Book 2 in the series!The ImpactWhat's next for the Lumins after Book 1? Kora has many more adventures ahead. We want to publish at least two more books in the Glimmer Series. Eventually, it is my dream to have it made into an animated film series. Each book will help to create new myths in our narrative about the complexity and challenges of our time when things are not just good or evil, black or white. It will also bring more attention and funds to social issues and eco challenges through the lens of a playful children’s perspective. It's also my desire that children will learn to grow up embracing their unique glow and special gifts in the world, and that parents will encourage them. As a child, I was a sensitive one that loved creating imaginal worlds. As an adult, I’d love to find ways to restore and honor the magic of the planet. Risks & ChallengesThis will be my first time publishing a graphic novel, though I have published and co-authored other books before. The main risk is that we will not raise enough funds to finish the illustrations and therefore publish the first edition. That’s where you come in…Other Ways You Can Help: Social Sharing Contest!If you can't contribute with a donation, here’s other ways you can help:From now until April 6, 2021 you can participate in the social sharing contest for parents/kids to be entered into a drawing to win a Lumin poster!Here’s how to enter:1. Parents/Kids: Print out this coloring page 2. Kids: Color your best, most creative way3. Parents: Have your parents post your entry on social media on Facebook, Instagram or TikTok with the hashtag #ilovelumins and Share the link to the Indegogo campaign https://igg.me/at/glimmerseriesOfficial Contest RulesOtherwise simply spread the word. Tell other parents, teachers, schools, kids and friends about the book and spread the word far and wide! Use the Indegogo share tools to share our campaign! Share: https://igg.me/at/glimmerseries

story:
ENTER BEAST DOMINION

Hello! My name is Paul Lavallee I am an artist and comic creator from Edmonton Canada. I am the penciler and writer of Beast Dominion! 

I have a  passion for comics and storytelling which is the driving force behind Beast Dominion. Not only is Beast Dominion an homage to the things I grew up loving such as superhero comics and cool movies like Akira and Pulp Fiction, but Beast Dominion is also a way for me to explore topical subjects like trans-humanism, AI and PTSD on a deeper level through this universe and these characters which I've created.

I love seeing awesome and dynamic artwork in comics, but I also realize the importance of a good story and I put a lot of work and effort into crafting and refining the story for Beast Dominion. This story contains plot twist and character development which I've crafted over the past 10 years self publishing in anthologies short stories or self-publishing. Beast Dominion #1 is a 36 page full color comic with brand new art which acts as a starting point in the creation of the Induced Comics Universe!

 

WHAT DO YOU GET WHEN BACKING THIS CAMPAIGN?

  • Beast dominion #1 (signed & numbered) - A 36 page(annual size) full color comic book printed on high quality newsprint paper. 
  • PDF - A PDF bundle containing all 36 pages of Beast Doiminion #1.
  • Trading Card - A limieted edition trading card soon to be revealed. 
  • Custom Sketch - B/W 6,5"x10" sketch/commission of your choosing. If you don't choose a character a Beast Dominion character will be chosen for your Sketch
  • Original Art - Original 11"x17" pencil art from the pages of Beast Dominion #1. Limited quantity.

  • Yourself Drawn Into the Comic - You can have yourself drawn into a panel of the Beast Dominion #1 comic as a brief cameo. You provide the reference photos. Very limited spots available.

WHY CROWDFUNDING?

As an independent comic creator crowdfunding is a chance to self publish and produce this comic with out the backing of a huge publisher. As a passion project I've already poured hundreds of hours and thousands of dollars into this project. Crowdfunding helps me to persue my dreams and passions for creating comics. A successful Indiegogo campaign also shows potential publishers and animation studios that there is a demand for new superheroes. 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Sharing this campaign with your friends is invaluable. This is how we find new fans and it's appreciated!

story:
Short Summary

This story follows a Junior male named Heisuke that meets this female transferred student; Hinako,  during the middle of the school year and she quickly falls in love with him. During this time, another student also falls in love with Hinako and everyone is shocked to see who it is! 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We need 3,000$  fund this project. Why, you may ask? We need to hire manga artists (that's 40$ per page, 80$ double sided) and pay our writers, editors, artists, going to con's (most expensive), and etc. Not to mention, trademarking and copyrighting!
  • Perks of investing in this project is receiving a free copy of the manga depending on how much you decide to invest. Including a colored copy
  • If we don't reach our goal of 2,000$, we'll use what we got and to the best of our ability, try to deliver the same product, we're going to have to lower the quality.
  • If there's still money leftover from the project, we'll be donating 35% of it to the Christopher & Dana Reeve Foundation disabled charity!

Risks & Challenges

The challenges that we are going to have to make is publishing. Publishing today as we know it today make's it easy for many to publish their own work. But due to the current pandemic, we may find ourselves struggling a little bit, but hopefully we can all get through this together! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get check this Indiegogo page out!
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Check out page out at instagram @TenchaAnime

story:
On the Wind River Indian Reservation in Wyoming, the Fort Washakie middle school boys basketball team navigates everyday challenges of life on a reservation while preparing for their upcoming game in a neighboring town. Meanwhile, fierce creatures of Shoshone legend, small-beings known as the Nimerigar, have emerged from hiding with vengeance in their hearts. Through a twist of events, it becomes clear that the Nimerigar are setting their sites on the traveling basketball team as the first victims on their fervent trek for revenge. It all boils to a head in a bloody confrontation at the paramount landmark, Crowheart Butte, a place of particular historical and spiritual significance to the Eastern Shoshone tribe and its people...

Crowheart Butte is a horror/fantasy graphic novel, but at its core is a stirring drama about a Native American teacher and coach and the team in which he guides and educates. The goal with this project was to tell an honest story that dealt with the real issues indigenous people face on U.S. reservations, but also to deliver a riveting creature-horror story that featured Native American characters often absent in not only horror, but popular culture in general.

 

About the Creator

My name is Zach Kennah, I am an artist and illustrator currently based in Los Angeles, California. After graduating from the University of Wyoming in 2014 with my BFA in Art, I moved to California to pursue a career in the arts. Having grown up in Wyoming, telling stories based in my home state is a trend that often shows up in my work. One of my favorite genres has always been horror, and I really appreciate when films, books, and comics push the boundaries of where the genre can go in terms of subject matter and originality in storytelling. In my own work, I often start with character and develop the story from there. I enjoy following characters naturally as opposed to in a contrived way designed to service plot whether it be in horror or any genre. I strive to present dynamic, unique, and diverse characters and I always try to implement them into my own work and ideas.

 

Funding, Impact, and the Risks Involved

The good news is that the novel is 100% complete. It is a 168 page full-color book that has taken 2 years to finish, and, for lack of a better phrase, is a real passion project. My father grew up in Fort Washakie on the reservation, and because of this and my family history, I have always had a strong interest in Native culture, as well as being a proponent of awareness in relation to Native American history and current contemporary issues. Crowheart Butte is a work that represents a combination of my love for art and horror, and my admiration and respect for Native people .

The funding for this project will be primarily used for book printing costs, but some will also go toward promotion and, of course, shipping expenses. Full-color book printing is crazy expensive and I want to be able to print as many copies as possible. Additionally, if I reach my goal of $4,000, I pledge to donate $1 for every $20 I raise to the Wind River Foundation, a non-profit based in Jackson, Wyoming whose mission is to advance philanthropy that will empower the indigenous communities of the  Wind River Indian Reservation in their work toward cultural revitalization, social progress, and economic prosperity. In other words, if I raise my $4000 goal, $200 will be donated to this organization and then for every $20 I raise beyond my goal I will donate an additional $1.

The risks involved for contributors are minimal since I have already completed the book. I am extremely determined to get this novel made into its physical, printed form, and if I attain funding there is absolutely no way I will not succeed in this goal. Even if I do not get the funds from this campaign I am prepared to use my own savings in order to fulfill perk promises and print a small run of the book to at least get it out there. I have worked too long and hard on this project and it means far too much to me for it to never see the light of day. Ultimately, the more money I raise the higher number of books I can print and the more people will be able to read this story that I personally feel deserves to be told.

If you are unable to contribute, I completely understand. With the current state of things I know it is not easy for many of us. Even if we want to be giving and generous, we may simply not be able to due to recent economic struggles. I also know that there are many other incredible projects and artists out there that deserve your generosity, as well as various social and political causes that quite honestly may seem more important right now than art and entertainment. At the end of the day I am just happy that you have taken the time to read this and see what I have been working on for the last couple years. If you are unable to donate, please consider following me on Instagram @zachkennah and helping to spread the word to your own friends and followers. Thank you all so much, it really means a lot.

-Zach Kennah

Creator of Crowheart Butte

September, 2020

story:
THE BOOK

Black Eye No. 3 is a departure from the previous two volumes in the series. Gone are the essays, the short fiction, the fake advertisements and the proliferation of gag panels. The focus here is on the comics form. This newest volume includes ten longer form sequential narratives, from four to ten pages in length, and a number of single page strips. The majority of the material was created specifically for this book and there are stories translated into English for the first time. Black Eye No. 3 continues a deep concern with all things dark and absurd, but builds from the premise that once you receive your third black eye, you will achieve a shameful enlightenment.

The contributors include:

Alexis Beauclair / Tom Bunk / Andy Burkholder / Max Clotfelter / Mark Dancey / Kayla E. / Vincenzo Fagnani / Penelope Gazin / Julia Gfrörer / Anna Haifisch / Corinne Halbert / Eric Haven / Ian Huebert / Alejandro Jodorowsky / Clara Bessijelle Johansson / Francis Kulikowski / Meghan Lamb / David Lynch / John Maggie / Nicolas Mahler / Jérôme Mulot / Erik Nebel / Paul Nudd / Onsmith / Pierre La Police / Helge Reumann / Josephin Ritschel / Martin Rowson / Florent Ruppert / Johnny Sampson / David Sandlin / S. William Schudlich / Santiago Sequeiros / Sammy Stein / Brecht Vandenbroucke / Chris Wright

The cover is by Joan Cornellà.

The book is edited by Ryan Standfest.

 

Black Eye No. 3 will be handsomely printed in a run of 1000 copies using offset lithography to preserve the richest blacks.

Select sample pages from a low-resolution mockup of the book:

Frontispiece image: Das Kapital, by Vincenzo Fagnani.

 

Excerpt of story by David Sandlin.

 

Excerpt of Black Medicine Skills by Helge Reumann.

 

Excerpt of story by Clara Bessijelle Johansson and Flies by Paul Nudd.

 

Excerpt of a story by Ruppert & Mulot and a page by Sammy Stein.

 

Excerpt of a story by Nicolas Mahler.

 

Excerpt of a story by Chris Wright.

 

Excerpt of story by Kayla E. & Meghan Lamb and a page by Corinne Halbert.

 

Excerpt of a story by Martin Rowson.

 

From the back cover.

WHAT WE NEED + WHAT YOU GET

As with previous campaigns, Rotland Press is making use of crowdfunding as a means to publish this project when it is most needed, by those who feel strongly that it needs to be seen. Black Eye No. 3 is a labor of love and is designed and packaged accordingly. It is the hope of Rotland Press that there is a growing audience for this material, who will fund it into existence out of a similar sense of urgency and care.

The proposed funding will cover the following:

  • Offset lithograph Printing costs for a 1000 copy print run: $3,500
  • Packaging to ship all books out to customers: $200
  • Risograph printing of a 100-run edition by UK artist Ben Jones, hand-signed and numbered by Jones, and available as an exclusive perk: $300
  • Printing of 200-copy run chapbook The Sightseer's Compliment, an ultra-limited, companion publication available ONLY to backers of Black Eye No. 3 : $400
  • Letterpress printing of a 100-run, letterpress edition by Chicago artist and Black Eye No. 3 contributor Paul Nudd, hand-signed and numbered by Nudd, available as an exclusive park: $400

Unique and exclusive perks include:

  • A Shameful Enlightenment : 100 copies of this risographed print, editioned by Jeffrey Evergreen at Cache Printing Services of Detroit, Mich. USA, will be hand-signed and numbered by the UK artist Ben Jones, who previously created the covers for BLACK EYE 2. This print was created exclusively for the Black Eye No. 3 campaign. Measures 8 x 10 inches on a newsprint grey paper. More on the work of Ben Jones: http://benjonesillustration.com

  • Tongue Stumped : 50 copies of this letterpressed print, editioned by Lee Marchelonis at Signal-Return of Detroit, Mich. USA, will be hand-signed and numbered by the Chicago artist Paul Nudd, who is a contributor to Black Eye No. 3. This print was created exclusively for Rotland Press. Measures 8 x 10 inches on a soft cream paper. More on the work of Paul Nudd: http://www.westernexhibitions.com/nudd/

 

  • The Sightseer's Complement : 200 copies of this 32-page chapbook will be made available ONLY to backers of the Black Eye No. 3 campaign, making this a true rarity. The Sightseer's Complement is a lavishly illustrated companion to Black Eye No. 3, presenting the work of 22  renowned international cartoonists creating pornographic works under a nom de plume. The book is intended as an homage to The Traveller's Companion, the series of cheaply-produced paperbacks edited by Maurice Girodias and his Paris-based publishing house Olympia Press, resulting in the publication of Henry Miller, Lawrence Durrell, Anaïs Nin, William S. Burroughs, Terry Southern, Vladimir Nabokov, Samuel Beckett and other much less reputable authors. Olympia's output was one that was equal parts smut and art. The Sightseer's Complement will be black and white, stapled and measuring an intimate 4.35 x 7 inches, so that it may be carried about on a walk or on the subway, with great ease.

 

  • Humour Noël Card Set : Just in time for the holiday season, nothing would go better with a copy of Black Eye No. 3 slipped into a nailed-up red stocking, than a pack of 11 Humour Noël cards from Rotland Press.  A previously unpublished and appropriately dark Christmas image adorns the front, and a postal compliant back allows you to mail these to unsuspecting friends and relatives during the holiday season. Undated so that they can be used any year. Highest quality printing on a matte cardstock. Cards by: Chris Cilla, Hugleikur Dagsson, Andy Gabrysiak and John Maggie, Gregory Jacobsen, Francis Kulikowski, John Lurie, Meredith Miotke, Onsmith + Nudd, Johnny Sampson and Stephen William Schudlich. Printed in an edition of 200;  4.25 x 5.5 inches each.

 

  • "Follow Your Bliss" Print by Johnny Sampson : An 18"x24" 4-color screen print on Manilla paper. Edition of 100, signed and numbered by the artist. Only 10 available.

 

  • The Trilogy : For those that have not purchased Black Eye 1 and 2, you have the opportunity to obtain those first two volumes plus the third, while helping to fund Black Eye No. 3. There are only 60 copies of Black Eye 1 remaining in stock before it goes out of print.

 

  • Tom Bunk Drawing : This is an original ink drawing created by artist Tom Bunk in 2015, prior to his creating the endpages for "Black Eye No. 3." It measures 9 x 8 inches on grey board. About Bunk: 

    Born Tomas Maria Bunk in Split, Croatia, he studied stage design and fine art at the Academy of Arts in Hamburg, Germany. In 1973, he moved to Berlin, where he began rendering humorous subjects in oil paintings. After selling these paintings in three successful shows, he turned to cartooning and contributed to underground comics in 1976.

    His cartoon creations appeared monthly in the satirical magazine "Pardon," other European comic magazines and comic anthologies. After collecting his comics in three books, he moved to New York in 1983 and began drawing for Raw, the graphic story magazine edited and published by Françoise Mouly and Art Spiegelman. He drew Topps trading cards, including "Wacky Packages" and "Garbage Pail Kids." In 1993, he became a regular "Mad cartoonist", and his contributions have led some to regard him as the modern-day replacement at "Mad" forWill Elder.

TIMELINE

The campaign for Black Eye No. 3 will last only 30 days. At the end of this period, pending successful funding, the following production sequence will unfold:

  • The completed PDF of the book will be delivered to the printer. Printing time is estimated to take three to five weeks, as the proofs will be delivered and inspected, with any needed corrections made, and the books will be transported from the printer to the press.
  • The prints are currently in production to allow enough time for them to be sent to the artists for signing. 
  • The Sightseer's Complement will be sent to the printer following the successful completion of the funding campaign. 
  • Books and accompanying printed ephemera are estimated to ship during the months of November and December (in time for Christmas). An email will be sent to verify and update all postal addresses. Time will be needed to package all orders and to ship out in groups as the press is operated by a small number of people.
  • Updates regarding every step of the process will be posted in the "Updates" section of this campaign, regularly.

THE CHALLENGE

Crowdfunding always relies on the openness and goodness of those who believe in the project they are committing to fund. Rotland Press is dedicated to funding Black Eye No. 3 and getting it and all of the perks that accompany it to you, as soon as the funding is complete. Should there be any delay in the timeline as outlined above, all contributors will receive notification.

The primary challenge is to fund the publication of Black Eye No. 3. The secondary challenge is for the campaign to fund and generate additional printed projects that find their way into your hands and help sustain the longterm efforts of Rotland Press.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you are unable to contribute funds to Black Eye No. 3, then the most immediate and important contribution you can make is to spread the word about this project and to help generate interest in supporting it. You will have the gratitude of all involved.

ABOUT ROTLAND PRESS

"Rotland Press seems to have its roots in The Realist and Grove Press c. 1960s more than in the Hippy UG press that followed or in the gentrified graphic novel presses that have come along since. Nihilists and other marginally socialized types will be as glad to discover their satirical publications as I've been." 

—Art Spiegelman, co-editor ofArcade and RAW, author of MAUS

Founded in 2010 by editor-in-chief and publisher Ryan Standfest (www.ryanstandfest.com), Rotland Press is a small publishing house located in Detroit, Michigan, USA. It is a publisher of printed projects that promote subversive humor— be it black, dark, gallows, satirical or absurd. Rotland Press aims to occupy a place between the mainstream and the avant-garde, the philistine and the genteel, industriously manufacturing the finest in despairing entertainment.

Visit Rotland Press at http://rotlandpress.com/
story_txt:
THE BOOKBlack Eye No. 3 is a departure from the previous two volumes in the series. Gone are the essays, the short fiction, the fake advertisements and the proliferation of gag panels. The focus here is on the comics form. This newest volume includes ten longer form sequential narratives, from four to ten pages in length, and a number of single page strips. The majority of the material was created specifically for this book and there are stories translated into English for the first time. Black Eye No. 3 continues a deep concern with all things dark and absurd, but builds from the premise that once you receive your third black eye, you will achieve a shameful enlightenment.The contributors include:Alexis Beauclair / Tom Bunk / Andy Burkholder / Max Clotfelter / Mark Dancey / Kayla E. / Vincenzo Fagnani / Penelope Gazin / Julia Gfrörer / Anna Haifisch / Corinne Halbert / Eric Haven / Ian Huebert / Alejandro Jodorowsky / Clara Bessijelle Johansson / Francis Kulikowski / Meghan Lamb / David Lynch / John Maggie / Nicolas Mahler / Jérôme Mulot / Erik Nebel / Paul Nudd / Onsmith / Pierre La Police / Helge Reumann / Josephin Ritschel / Martin Rowson / Florent Ruppert / Johnny Sampson / David Sandlin / S. William Schudlich / Santiago Sequeiros / Sammy Stein / Brecht Vandenbroucke / Chris WrightThe cover is by Joan Cornellà.The book is edited by Ryan Standfest. Black Eye No. 3 will be handsomely printed in a run of 1000 copies using offset lithography to preserve the richest blacks.Select sample pages from a low-resolution mockup of the book:Frontispiece image: Das Kapital, by Vincenzo Fagnani. Excerpt of story by David Sandlin. Excerpt of Black Medicine Skills by Helge Reumann. Excerpt of story by Clara Bessijelle Johansson and Flies by Paul Nudd. Excerpt of a story by Ruppert & Mulot and a page by Sammy Stein. Excerpt of a story by Nicolas Mahler. Excerpt of a story by Chris Wright. Excerpt of story by Kayla E. & Meghan Lamb and a page by Corinne Halbert. Excerpt of a story by Martin Rowson. From the back cover.WHAT WE NEED + WHAT YOU GETAs with previous campaigns, Rotland Press is making use of crowdfunding as a means to publish this project when it is most needed, by those who feel strongly that it needs to be seen. Black Eye No. 3 is a labor of love and is designed and packaged accordingly. It is the hope of Rotland Press that there is a growing audience for this material, who will fund it into existence out of a similar sense of urgency and care.The proposed funding will cover the following:
Offset lithograph Printing costs for a 1000 copy print run: $3,500

Packaging to ship all books out to customers: $200

Risograph printing of a 100-run edition by UK artist Ben Jones, hand-signed and numbered by Jones, and available as an exclusive perk: $300

Printing of 200-copy run chapbook The Sightseer's Compliment, an ultra-limited, companion publication available ONLY to backers of Black Eye No. 3 : $400

Letterpress printing of a 100-run, letterpress edition by Chicago artist and Black Eye No. 3 contributor Paul Nudd, hand-signed and numbered by Nudd, available as an exclusive park: $400

Unique and exclusive perks include:
A Shameful Enlightenment : 100 copies of this risographed print, editioned by Jeffrey Evergreen at Cache Printing Services of Detroit, Mich. USA, will be hand-signed and numbered by the UK artist Ben Jones, who previously created the covers for BLACK EYE 2. This print was created exclusively for the Black Eye No. 3 campaign. Measures 8 x 10 inches on a newsprint grey paper. More on the work of Ben Jones: http://benjonesillustration.com

Tongue Stumped : 50 copies of this letterpressed print, editioned by Lee Marchelonis at Signal-Return of Detroit, Mich. USA, will be hand-signed and numbered by the Chicago artist Paul Nudd, who is a contributor to Black Eye No. 3. This print was created exclusively for Rotland Press. Measures 8 x 10 inches on a soft cream paper. More on the work of Paul Nudd: http://www.westernexhibitions.com/nudd/
 
The Sightseer's Complement : 200 copies of this 32-page chapbook will be made available ONLY to backers of the Black Eye No. 3 campaign, making this a true rarity. The Sightseer's Complement is a lavishly illustrated companion to Black Eye No. 3, presenting the work of 22  renowned international cartoonists creating pornographic works under a nom de plume. The book is intended as an homage to The Traveller's Companion, the series of cheaply-produced paperbacks edited by Maurice Girodias and his Paris-based publishing house Olympia Press, resulting in the publication of Henry Miller, Lawrence Durrell, Anaïs Nin, William S. Burroughs, Terry Southern, Vladimir Nabokov, Samuel Beckett and other much less reputable authors. Olympia's output was one that was equal parts smut and art. The Sightseer's Complement will be black and white, stapled and measuring an intimate 4.35 x 7 inches, so that it may be carried about on a walk or on the subway, with great ease. 
Humour Noël Card Set : Just in time for the holiday season, nothing would go better with a copy of Black Eye No. 3 slipped into a nailed-up red stocking, than a pack of 11 Humour Noël cards from Rotland Press.  A previously unpublished and appropriately dark Christmas image adorns the front, and a postal compliant back allows you to mail these to unsuspecting friends and relatives during the holiday season. Undated so that they can be used any year. Highest quality printing on a matte cardstock. Cards by: Chris Cilla, Hugleikur Dagsson, Andy Gabrysiak and John Maggie, Gregory Jacobsen, Francis Kulikowski, John Lurie, Meredith Miotke, Onsmith + Nudd, Johnny Sampson and Stephen William Schudlich. Printed in an edition of 200;  4.25 x 5.5 inches each.
 
"Follow Your Bliss" Print by Johnny Sampson : An 18"x24" 4-color screen print on Manilla paper. Edition of 100, signed and numbered by the artist. Only 10 available. 
The Trilogy : For those that have not purchased Black Eye 1 and 2, you have the opportunity to obtain those first two volumes plus the third, while helping to fund Black Eye No. 3. There are only 60 copies of Black Eye 1 remaining in stock before it goes out of print. 
Tom Bunk Drawing : This is an original ink drawing created by artist Tom Bunk in 2015, prior to his creating the endpages for "Black Eye No. 3." It measures 9 x 8 inches on grey board. About Bunk: Born Tomas Maria Bunk in Split, Croatia, he studied stage design and fine art at the Academy of Arts in Hamburg, Germany. In 1973, he moved to Berlin, where he began rendering humorous subjects in oil paintings. After selling these paintings in three successful shows, he turned to cartooning and contributed to underground comics in 1976.
His cartoon creations appeared monthly in the satirical magazine "Pardon," other European comic magazines and comic anthologies. After collecting his comics in three books, he moved to New York in 1983 and began drawing for Raw, the graphic story magazine edited and published by Françoise Mouly and Art Spiegelman. He drew Topps trading cards, including "Wacky Packages" and "Garbage Pail Kids." In 1993, he became a regular "Mad cartoonist", and his contributions have led some to regard him as the modern-day replacement at "Mad" forWill Elder.
TIMELINEThe campaign for Black Eye No. 3 will last only 30 days. At the end of this period, pending successful funding, the following production sequence will unfold:
The completed PDF of the book will be delivered to the printer. Printing time is estimated to take three to five weeks, as the proofs will be delivered and inspected, with any needed corrections made, and the books will be transported from the printer to the press.
The prints are currently in production to allow enough time for them to be sent to the artists for signing. 

The Sightseer's Complement will be sent to the printer following the successful completion of the funding campaign. 
Books and accompanying printed ephemera are estimated to ship during the months of November and December (in time for Christmas). An email will be sent to verify and update all postal addresses. Time will be needed to package all orders and to ship out in groups as the press is operated by a small number of people.
Updates regarding every step of the process will be posted in the "Updates" section of this campaign, regularly.
THE CHALLENGECrowdfunding always relies on the openness and goodness of those who believe in the project they are committing to fund. Rotland Press is dedicated to funding Black Eye No. 3 and getting it and all of the perks that accompany it to you, as soon as the funding is complete. Should there be any delay in the timeline as outlined above, all contributors will receive notification.The primary challenge is to fund the publication of Black Eye No. 3. The secondary challenge is for the campaign to fund and generate additional printed projects that find their way into your hands and help sustain the longterm efforts of Rotland Press.OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELPIf you are unable to contribute funds to Black Eye No. 3, then the most immediate and important contribution you can make is to spread the word about this project and to help generate interest in supporting it. You will have the gratitude of all involved.ABOUT ROTLAND PRESS"Rotland Press seems to have its roots in The Realist and Grove Press c. 1960s more than in the Hippy UG press that followed or in the gentrified graphic novel presses that have come along since. Nihilists and other marginally socialized types will be as glad to discover their satirical publications as I've been." —Art Spiegelman, co-editor ofArcade and RAW, author of MAUSFounded in 2010 by editor-in-chief and publisher Ryan Standfest (www.ryanstandfest.com), Rotland Press is a small publishing house located in Detroit, Michigan, USA. It is a publisher of printed projects that promote subversive humor— be it black, dark, gallows, satirical or absurd. Rotland Press aims to occupy a place between the mainstream and the avant-garde, the philistine and the genteel, industriously manufacturing the finest in despairing entertainment.Visit Rotland Press at http://rotlandpress.com/

story:
HENRY ROSCOE: DETECTIVE, SORT OF

VOL. 1 - JUSTICE IS BLIND... DRUNK

SYNOPSIS:

Henry O’Toole has intentionally underachieved in life.  With an IQ of 185, Henry understood that in order to grow up in Troubles Belfast it was best to not see or know too much.  Now an adult, he's been robotripping (mixing alcohol and cough medicine to slow his motor functions) for the majority of his life; happy to idle away the weather-beaten days in Belfast with friends, pub quizzes and suffering through the ritualistic humiliations of his ex-wife Joy and her new love Jimmy. 

 That is until Henry loses his job forcing him to re-evaluate his options and ultimately answer the call of the Raymond Chandler “romance” of private investigation work. With an ad in his local Tesco Metro and an almost homicidal determination to defeat the seemingly invincible local pub quiz champions Henry sees his world change almost overnight. Soon he is sucked into a deadly realm of drugs, sex, murder and picture rounds; as curiosity becomes intrigue and danger becomes death Henry finds himself out of his depth and tangled up in a Noir landscape so dark only the true gumshoe can emerge.  

Henry Roscoe: Detective, Sort of is part murder-mystery, part sports story (for the physically unfit/asthmatic) set against the backdrop of a modern day Belfast as chiaroscuro-clad and atmospheric as the Warner Bros. lot of 1940s Hollywood.

ABOUT ME: 

I am a writer from Belfast, Northern Ireland.  Aside from my own projects which can be found on the Heroes of Hollywood Boulevard website, I have contributed to the 2015 Literally Stories Anthology, the New Coin Poetry Journal, and the 2016 Nevermore Arts Festival.

In 2014 I received an Independent Writer Award from the Arts Council of Northern Ireland.

 

WHERE YOUR WILL MONEY GO:

All money contributed will go into the production of trade standard comic books.  I have no interest in attempting to us people's money to fund time off work to complete the project, or buy a new drawing tablet, or anything else that people may or may not feel entitled to.  The way I see it is that if this is something I want to be able to do, I should pay for the materials, put in the hours and deal with the inconveniences on time and the deadlines myself.  All I want is to attempt to find an audience for the comic prior to sinking money into a print run.

I am not the greatest artist in the world.  I've barely touched a drawing pencil since High School, but I desperately want to be able to share this story with fans of detective fiction and do not feel I can ask anyone to commit the amount of time this requires.  In the future, it may be possible to have artists on board for other issues and it would be great to find someone who was as passionate and committed to this story and these characters as I am but it's not essential.  What is essential is an audience willing to put their money where my mouth is.

 

Thank you for considering helping out ol' Hank.

 

DAVE

story:
"SICK N' BEAUTIFUL: GROUND ZERO"

 

**CHECK OUT the First 24 pages in the Update Section, for a free preview!!

WHAT IS MORE RIVETING THAN REALITY ITSELF?

48-pages of a new, one-of-a-kind graphic novel that travels the universe and dimensions. From the ink of the printed page, to the blood, sweat and poison tears of real-life aliens.

SICK N' BEAUTIFUL: GROUND ZERO is the inter-dimensional rock n' roll project that blurs the lines and breaches the borders between fiction and reality. It's the epic tale of the adventures of a ragtag outfit of renegade extraterrestrials, marooned on planet Earth, in search for a way back home.

While real-life, flesh-and-bone SICK N' BEAUTIFUL rock stages across the world, this comic book will reveal the TRUE ORIGINS behind all the grit and madness. What secrets will be revealed about seductive, green-haired hybrid Herma, the enigmatic silent space traveler RevC2, the blood-sucking plant-creature named Evey, the blue eyed berseker Lobo or yet again of surly captain Big Daddy Ray, a veteran of too many bootleg runs?

Blood, bullets, bounty hunters, foxy hybrids, an evil Confederation... the ingredients for the adventure of a lifetime are all there, magnificently rendered in the psychedelic style of artist Alessio Maruccia of BUGS COMICS fame, and the gripping mindtrips of author Marco Scali.

 

    "It's like The Fantastic Four meet Fear And Loathing In Las Vegas - minus the drugs, possibly!" - Daniele "Kinder" Rea of NERDFACE on SICK N' BEAUTIFUL: GROUND ZERO

    The Rock Begins To Roll at GROUND ZERO!

    A multi-species crew of aliens on the run, cast away on a strange planet, on a broken ship with a dead pilot. An evil Confederation in pursuit across the universe. How will a naive songstress with a career in dire straits save the day?

    Captain "Big Daddy" Ray, his first mate Lobo, cryptic humanoid RevC2 and their pilot have been on many a smuggling run on the BFS9000, a ship that undoubtedly has seen better days. On their way back from a bounty hunt, they get intercepted by a Confederation patrol, right around the Sol system.

    Heavy fire is exchanged, and after a strenuous fight, the BFS9000 is forced into an emergency landing on Terra, a primitive but densely populated world who still has never had contact with life forms from other galaxies.

    While the pilot daringly manages to salvage the precious cargo and the lives of everyone else aboard the vessel, she meets her own unfortunate death in the disastrous crash.

    This is very bad news for the survivors: the bio-drive of the spacecraft requires a very specific DNA sequence for its symbiotic reactors to work. While they know perfectly well that they would never find another pilot of the same species of the deceased on Terra, they decide to attempt an hybridization process, by transplanting key organs for the drive into a live human female. While Lobo and RevC2 keep assessing the damage on the ship and deal with "minor" crises, the Captain sets out to find a suitable candidate for pilot replacement.

    Herma Greta is a young, aspiring singer who loves and lives to rock out. However, her career has not been so lucky. She's changed many bands that wouldn't take her seriously; she's fallen prey of unscrupulous managers and shady record company executives - and after so many years of trying to break into the music business, she's just about to give up.

    Little does she know that destiny is about to put her on a path that will lead her - literally - to the stars! Abducted and taken aboard the ship, she is to be implanted with alien organs and bionic parts and become the new pilot of the BFS9000.

    Lobo has been working together with Big Daddy for as long as he can remember. The ship is the only home he's ever known. It's a lifestyle that takes its on toll on the best of 'em, but Lobo is no ordinary Berserker! He knows both the game and the players very well, and he can take care of pretty much every situation... the Lobo way!

    But still, he remains very surprised to discover that after the landing on Terra, some of the spores collected from many corners of the galaxy have sprouted into some kind of cute, sentient flower-like being. Lobo likes it very much, and starts carrying the "thing" around with him, much like a pirate with a parrot in the olden days...

    But peril lurks at any corner: besides the hardships of being on a strange planet, Denib, a dangerous inter-dimensional criminal, manages to flee its containment cage, and it will be up to Lobo to face this critical, psychotropic threat.

    In the meantime, Confederation minion ARC, a reptilian hunter with an army of war drones is following the tracks that lead to the wreckage of the BFS9000 - to exact hiss revenge on Big Daddy and its crew.

    While Herma struggles with her new reality, confrontations will come to a climactic close, as the different story-lines merge into one. There will be blood. Lots of blood. Some will die, some will feed.

    But for those who'll live to see the day, the adventure is only just begun...

                 

    SICK N' BEAUTIFUL is the ultimate rock n' roll circus from outer space;

    Part industrial, part steampunk, part cyber-goth, part metal, with influences ranging from Rob Zombie, Nine Inch Nails, Kiss and Alice Cooper.  We are full of Special Effects, Costumes, Laser Beams and Witchcraft.
     

    Our most recent album "Element of Sex" was released June 29, 2018 and was directly funded by our amazing fans throughout the world.  We continue our "Invasions" and look to bring our performance to even more inhabitants of Earth.  Since our last sighting in the UK in the Spring, we have wasted no time in planning this most Epic release of "Ground Zero" so we may share with you our story of how it all began.

    This campaign will help SICK N' BEAUTIFUL pay for art, lettering, editing, a print run of 1,000 books for the graphic novel, and the beautiful cover by superstar artists Alessio Maruccia, Jano and Herma herself.

    << Music industry has changed a lot nowadays on Earth, and what we've learned in these 4 years we've been living on this planet is being more than just an artist, being part of a community is the only real way to keep "creation" alive.

    We want this adventure to be yours as much as ours, and so we're asking directly to you to join this extraterrestrial gang and become a producer of this comic book! >>  

    Herma

    With your help we will be able to:

    •  Give to the artists we hired, the possibility to pay their food for living! 
    •  Print the copies of our comic book to share with you and the rest of the people of Earth!
    •  Help cover the cost of the promotion of this campaign and the release of "Ground Zero"
    •  Help us fund our future "Invasions" to bring the people of Earth our story and our music physically!

    What are we offering? A Sci-fi 360° experience! Read about our story while listening to our songs, cover from floor to ceiling you room with our posters and pictures, proudly wear our t-shirts - vessel of your pure GREEN blood - and share our unique handmade artifacts with your Terran friends! Meet brilliant, friendly people all in the name of Rock N' Roll and keep our gratitude forever!

    • See Update Section for Shipping Prices.  Free Shipping to Italy, Very Discounted Shipping in Europe, and Discounted Shipping Worldwide.  https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/sick-n-beautiful-s-comic-ground-zero/x/19111393#/updates/4
    • Limited Edition Hardcover - Signed and # Hardcover copy of "Ground Zero"  Includes extra pages with unreleased photos of the band, behind the scenes "making of" photos, some original sketches used in the comic book, and comments from each member of the band.
    • Sketch - Hand drawn Original sketch by Herma of a character of your choice.  Signed by Herma!
    • Colored Sketch - Hand drawn, and fully colored page by Herma, that includes the sketch of a character of your choice.  Signed by Herma!
    • All Orders will receive a PDF version of "Ground Zero"  + Unreleased HI-Res Photo Bundle of the band + Your Name in the Comic Book Credits!!
    • Exclusive SNB T-shirt designed by TIZIANA DEL PIERO ( From Fidanzato Vampiro )

     

    • If you have any suggestions for a Perk, or any Items you would like to see us offer in this campaign, please send us a message!
      • Also, if you are interested in creating a custom Perk from the Items you see throughout this campaign, send us a message to the Project Owner at the top - "Ask A Question"  or you may email us at mgmt@sicknbeautiful.com and we would be happy to discuss your idea!

     

    STRETCH GOALS:

     

    Upon completion of this campaign, the shipping of the "Perks" is expected to be between November and December 2018. Though we will do our best to let you have them earlier! 

     

    Want to help the aliens be successful?

    • Ask Earth people to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
    • Use Indiegogo’s Sharing Tools and help us reach as many people as you can! You can find the buttons at the top of the page, under the "amount raised" section. They look like this:​   

        

    ​​

 Print the copies of our comic book to share with you and the rest of the people of Earth!
 Help cover the cost of the promotion of this campaign and the release of "Ground Zero"
 Help us fund our future "Invasions" to bring the people of Earth our story and our music physically!

What are we offering? A Sci-fi 360° experience! Read about our story while listening to our songs, cover from floor to ceiling you room with our posters and pictures, proudly wear our t-shirts - vessel of your pure GREEN blood - and share our unique handmade artifacts with your Terran friends! Meet brilliant, friendly people all in the name of Rock N' Roll and keep our gratitude forever!



See Update Section for Shipping Prices.  Free Shipping to Italy, Very Discounted Shipping in Europe, and Discounted Shipping Worldwide.  https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/sick-n-beautiful-s-comic-ground-zero/x/19111393#/updates/4


Limited Edition Hardcover - Signed and # Hardcover copy of "Ground Zero"  Includes extra pages with unreleased photos of the band, behind the scenes "making of" photos, some original sketches used in the comic book, and comments from each member of the band.

Sketch - Hand drawn Original sketch by Herma of a character of your choice.  Signed by Herma!

Colored Sketch - Hand drawn, and fully colored page by Herma, that includes the sketch of a character of your choice.  Signed by Herma!
All Orders will receive a PDF version of "Ground Zero"  + Unreleased HI-Res Photo Bundle of the band + Your Name in the Comic Book Credits!!

Exclusive SNB T-shirt designed by TIZIANA DEL PIERO ( From Fidanzato Vampiro )

 

If you have any suggestions for a Perk, or any Items you would like to see us offer in this campaign, please send us a message!Also, if you are interested in creating a custom Perk from the Items you see throughout this campaign, send us a message to the Project Owner at the top - "Ask A Question"  or you may email us at mgmt@sicknbeautiful.com and we would be happy to discuss your idea!






 

STRETCH GOALS:

 
Upon completion of this campaign, the shipping of the "Perks" is expected to be between November and December 2018. Though we will do our best to let you have them earlier! 
 
Want to help the aliens be successful?

Ask Earth people to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
Use Indiegogo’s Sharing Tools and help us reach as many people as you can! You can find the buttons at the top of the page, under the "amount raised" section. They look like this:​   

    
​​

story:
Short Summary

This project is for an All-Ages Coloring book of Junior High Horrors, the first ever all-ages horror parody that Robert Kirkman may have called "Awesome," from creator Rob Potchak and series artist Eric Kent. Our entry video is from Rob's appearance on ABC'S LOCALISH where they showed off Junior High Horrors as the first ever Dyslexia Friendly Comic Series.

Junior High Horrors is the first ever All-Ages Horror Parody, allowing parents the opportunity to let their kids have something "horror" without having to worry about the content. The horror of JHH is that it literally IS kids going through the pains of middle school and all that entails. It just helps that the characters are recognizable to adults, too, as are the easter eggs throughout the books. Junior High Horrors also became the first comic book ever to be "Dyslexia Friendly," using open source dyslexia friendly fonts to help those struggling with dyslexia to distinguish the difference between similar letters (see attached video)

We are looking to deliver a 32 page coloring book at 8.5X11 inches in size, depicting scenes from your favorite issues of Keenspot's series, Junior High Horrors. Many of the pages will be the black and white versions of the covers from Potchak and Kent, as well as other art from the series, and some guest artists as well, like Chris Giarrusso (Mini Marvels, G-Man). 

What We Need & What You Get

We already have the commitment from the other artists and the cover artwork and all of the pages from Potchak and Kent are already completed and formatted for book, so we are waiting on the art from the guest contributors to have the book ready to deliver to the printer. 

What we are looking for is the funding to get it to the printer, take care of the printing and shipping costs, as well as the costs of the labor for the project from the team working on the project.

Perks depending on tier will include:

-PDF version of the coloring book so you can print out the pages to color over and over again, 

-Physical copy of the Coloring book, both unsigned and signed versions will be available

- Unique sketch cards drawn by Potchak or Kent of your favorite JHH Characters

- Unique drawings of YOU as a character in the style of Junior High Horrors

- Stickers and Enamel Pins

- Original art pages from the book

- Custom merchandise ONLY available through this campaign

-Retailer only tiers that allow discounted copies of the coloring book so they can sell the books at a profit themselves, and possibly some stretch goals like retailer only cover.

The Impact

We have delivered 8 comics over two years and in that time, there was very little profit for Junior High Horrors, yet we know we have a very loyal fanbase. The contributions for this coloring book would allow us to continue to deliver more Junior High Horrors stories and allow these kids stories to continue, while delivering on the promise of making all the issues Dyslexia Friendly.

Risks & Challenges

As stated above, our challenge isn't getting this book to the loyal fanbase of Junior High Horrors, as most of the book is completed and very little worry is there. There is more challenge to continuing to write and draw the regular Junior High Horrors comics, as the profit margins are very minute compared to the amount of time, work and effort that goes into creating each issue of the comic. 

The risks are also very low. We have delivered 10 books without missing a deadline on getting it to the publisher on time, and stake our reputations on that. 

The only other risk/challenge presented is having the project printed and shipped on time in this current pandemic filled climate.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know our fanbase is loyal, and we are just asking that you help get the word out. Share links to our campaign, tell middle school teachers and libraries about the project and ask that they help in any way they can.

story:
Judgement day has come.  Humanity has been captured by aliens.  Taken to another planet filled with strange plants and monsters.  Some will die, others will make it back to earth. Watch as a hero emerges.  Find out if you make it off the planet in the "Become a character" perk.  This book is created in the traditional manga format.  So you must read the pages right to left instead of left to right.

STRETCH GOALS

$3500- Every backer gets a Reclaiming Zandara metal bookmark

$4500- Every backer gets a Reclaiming Zandara bottle opener

$7500- Every backer gets a 12 x 18 inch metal Reclaiming Zandara poster

$8000- Every metal poster will be autographed

$10000- Everyone backer will receive a Reclaiming Zandara t shirt.

Backing this book not only helps to fund the creation of the book, but also funds the creation of a new animation studio.  The goal of this new animation studio is to give indie creators a chance to bring their projects to the screen.

story:
LAST TIME: Not only did we Mega Fund Firebitch Issue 1, we also did amazing with my cosplay book, Confessions of a Cosplay DIVA, and with my 2021 Cos-Lingerie Calendar, all of which have shipped in their entirety! Now, get ready, for what we have all been waiting for: the return of the vivacious, the irreverent, the fiery fox, FIREBITCH (now say that five times fast). If you love comics, cosplay, and/or nerd rock, this is the comic for you!

Hello again! Cara Nicole, comic creator, cosplayer, singer, and comedian! I am here to bring you the second issue of my runaway hit comic Firebitch! Me, and Co-Creator Alfred Trujillo, have worked for Coffin Comics (Lady Death/La Muerta), Big Dog Ink, Zenescope, Totally Rad Comics, and we’re just getting started.

Firebitch is a high octane, no holds barred, action-adventure, following unlikely heroine Chastity Chase, as she struggles to help an alien race facing total eradication. This social media diva must harness her new powers, defeat a menacing galactic overlord, and get home to her fans, or die trying!

Firebitch was co-created by me and Alfred Trujillo in 2012. We both share in writing, and art duties, and we’re adding a new dimension to this campaign by bringing you a kickass rock opera soundtrack, with some original songs for the book, as well as a cover or two. Trust me, you’ll be into it!

Our first issue was 32 pages of total comic madness and issue 2 will definitely follow that tradition. Get ready for some intense high-stakes heroine battles, with a gorgeous sci-fi intergalactic style, and some real feels, as the book immerses you into the world of our selfish insta-heroine #firebitch.

We’re doing it again, but way fiercer!

In addition to the intense interiors, super sassy, super cool, cosplay covers, and amazing guest artists that participate in the book, we have some supremely intense add ons and stretch goals that will keep you at the edge of your seat as we see if we can beat the last issue’s campaign. This is so exciting!

David Harrigan, Shikari, Lucio Parillo, Tevan, Ash Madi, Courtney Rose, Federico Sioc JR, JT Molloy, Lucio Parrillo, CB Zane, Shikari, Rob Hicks, Giovanni Borunda, Neto Sans, Lenadai, Wendy Shaner, Shelby Robertson, Piper Rudich, Torn-S, Danielle Gransaull, Anthony Delaney, and Stef Wilson are some of our artists contributing to this book!  Get excited because the art is amazing <3

Oh no! Missed issue 1? Got you covered!  ;) If you haven't gotten your copy of issue one, we have a special cover for this campaign. Add it on to your pledge for just $15! 

BUNDLE PACKS! 

Cosplay Super Pack! This is for the cosplay enthusiast. It includes ALL of my cosplay covers as well as the 3 prints Super Sexy, Super Sassy, and Super Fun. This is a great bargain!

Red Hot Pack!! A little bit of the best! This pack is loaded with a taste of everything in the art department! 10 Firebitch Covers a cut above the breast! A great bang for your buck!

VIP! You down with VIP? Yea you know me ;) This is only for the serious collector. This special package comes with 35 covers, 5 prints, and even the body pillowcase!!

 24"x36" Out of This Galaxy Poster - Grab this amazing poster in large format for your viewing pleasure. Firebitch is truly out of this world!

CARA NICOLE - FLAMING LIPS
Firebitch creator Cara Nicole cosplaying over here! Included in The Cosplay Super Pack, VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $20.

CARA NICOLE - I'LL BE YOUR FIREBITCH
Feel the blood flow! Ignite by getting this rocking cosplay cover. Included in The Cosplay Super Pack, VIP, and Producer packages  Also available as an add-on for $20.   

CARA NICOLE - THE FIRE GOES ON AND ON
Let's set the sky ablaze with this totally 80's cover. Included in The Cosplay Super Pack!!  VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on and on for $20. 

CARA NICOLE - BURNING FOR YOU - HOLOFOIL
Alfred Trujillo did amazing photography with this practical effect shot! No Cara's were harmed in the making ;) Included in The Cosplay Super Pack, VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $30.

CARA NICOLE - HEAT OF THE MOMENT (Holofoil)
You know cos-lingerie is my thing! Cozy up with this cover and feel the heat! Included in The Cosplay Super Pack, VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $30.

CARA NICOLE - HOTTER THAN HELL (Holofoil)
What are you waiting for!? Get this ultra-sexy topless cover while it's hot ;) Also included in The Cosplay Super Pack, VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $65.

ALFRED TRUJILLO & CARA NICOLE - MIRROR MIRROR
Who is the fairest of them all!? Find out when you get this cover by me and Alfred! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $20.

ALFRED TRUJILLO & CARA NICOLE - FRIENDLY FIRE
When not saving the day, Chastity loves to kick back!  Join her on the exciting planet Roj'R on this riverside. Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $20.

ALFRED TRUJILLO & CARA NICOLE - RADIANCE 
We liked this concept so much we developed it and brought it as a cover for you!  Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $20.

ALFRED TRUJILLO & CARA NICOLE - ACTION COMICS 1 HOMAGE
We love the classics! Get his Joe Shuster homage cover of the iconic Supes pose! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $20.

ALFRED TRUJILLO - RING OF FIRE (HOLOFOIL)
Digitally painted cover by Alfred Trujillo this cover will shine its way into your eyes. Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $30. 

ALFRED TRUJILLO - FIRE BREATHER
Breathe some flame into your Firebitch collection with this cover drawn and colored by Alfred. Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $20.

ALFRED TRUJILLO - OPEN FLAME (2 BOOK SET)
Lenadai lends some super smooth colors for this two cover set! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Naughty version also comes in the Red Hot Pack. They are also available as add ons individually! Also available as an add-on for $20 Nice and $35 Naughty.

ALFRED TRUJILLO - CATCHING FIRE
Virgin HOLOFOIL jeweled cover with colors by Ceci De La Cruz will be the crown jewel of your Firebitch collection! Jeweling by our girl Shannon Galarneau aka HRH Princess Jewel <3  Comes with Red Hot, VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $50.

ALFRED TRUJILLO - BEDS ARE BURNING
Sanju Nivangune is red hot with the colors for this holofoil cover! Comes with Red Hot, VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $30.

ALFRED TRUJILLO & SHELBY ROBERTSON - ASM 316 HOMAGE
Pixeltool laid down some sweet colors on this Amazing Spider Man 316 homage cover! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $20.

ALFRED TRUJILLO - WINGS OF FIRE
Tevan is out of this world with his spectacular colors! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $20.

 

GUEST ARTISTS (alphabetical)


ANTHONY DELANEY - SHE'S SO UNUSUAL Cindy Lauper Homage
You know AYEDEE himself has those rocker covers down! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $20.

ASH MADI - ROCK ON
Throw them horns! Colors by Federico Pepito Sioc Jr. Comes with Red Hot, VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $20.

CB ZANE - ARMY OF DARKNESS HOMAGE
Hail to the Firebitch, baby! Colors by the awesome Ylenia DiNapoli. Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $20.

COURTNEY ROSE - ALL I WANT FOR CHRISTMAS
Get in the holiday spirit with this Mariah Carey homage. Colors by Federico Pepito Sioc Jr. Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $20.

DAVE HARRIGAN: NIP SLIP
Ready? Switch! Fits well enough! Comes with Red Hot, VIP, and Producer packages.Also available as an add-on for $20.

 JT MOLLOY - BEST SHOT 

JT did a lovely job with our two girls! Show him some love. Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $20.

LENA DAI - SOME LIKE IT HOT (2 BOOK SET)
Lena brings the heat on this two book set. Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Naughty comes with Red Hot. Also available individually as Add-Ons! $20 Nice, $35 Naughty.

LUCIO PARRILLO - FIRE AWAY
Get this beautiful virgin cover in HOLOFOIL by the new MASTER ARTIST Lucio Parrillo. Comes with Red Hot, VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $40

SHIKARII - SPACE HOTTIE (3 BOOK  FOIL VIRGIN SET)
This three cover set is out of this world!! Shikarii has totally brought out the big guns for his cover and it is oh so shiny! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Nude comes in the Red Hot pack. Also available as add ons.  Nice: $40 Bikini: $45 & Naughty: $50

STEF WILSON - BLINDED BY THE LIGHT (2 BOOK SET)
Her clothes must have burned off! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Naughty comes in the Red Hot Pack. Also available as add ons. Nice: $20 Naughty: $35

WENDY SHANER - FLAMING DEVIL (2 BOOK SET)
Naughty Faeries creator Wendy brings us her sweet brand of 3d art! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Naughty comes in the Red Hot Pack. Also available as add ons. Nice: $20 Naughty: $35

 

ADD-ONS 

Okay, so one of the awesome things about having had such a successful first campaign is that we got to go out and find some spectacular artists to work with, and we created beautiful Firebitch art which gave us more options for things to add on.

Add on Variant Books!

ROB HICKS - MELTING MAGMA    
Rob and Federico Sioc Jr created this very hot cover! $20 Add on. Included in Producer tiers.

 

RUBEN ROSAS - FLARE 
Ruben painted this three cover set for the occasion. $20 nice, $20 bikini, and $30 naughty. Included in Producer tiers.

 

PIPER RUDICH - PIPING HOT 
Piper's cover will keep you warm this winter!  $20 Nice, $30 Naughty.  Included in Producer tiers.

 

NETO SAN - HERE KITTY KITTY 
Nice $20, Naughty $30. Included in Producer tiers.

 

ALFRED TRUJILLO - FIREBITCH 1! FIRE ISLANDS 
Fly away with your girl to an exotic alien world and catch up on the FIRST issue of Firebitch with this lovely digitally painted cover by Alfred Trujillo! Included in Producer tiers. Add-On $15  

 

                                                                     ADD ON EXTRAS!

BODY PILLOW CASE: Dakimakura style body pillow with art by Torn-S. Included in Producer and VIP tiers. $25 buckaroos!  Note: Case only, pillow not included. 

 

Show your Team Spirit in your very own 183 Degree Fire Logo T-Shirt! Add On $25

PRINTS:

You know them! You love them! Art prints are all the rage. Get our sets of prints which will help flex with your Firebitch collection, and feel free to add individuals as well.

We know you love Firebitch as much as we do! Feel the burn. Included in Producer and VIP tiers.

BLAZE OF GLORY ART PRINT:  $20  By Alfred Trujillo and Tevan, this is the main cover for issue 2.

 

Light My Fire: with this Rock N Roll Firebitch'n Art Print by Alfred Trujillo and Federico Sioc Jr. Comes in some tier levels. $20

 

Super Sassy Cosplay with this Cara Nicole Cosplay Print! 11x17 Add on $20 Comes in some tier levels.

 

Super Sexy 11x17 Cara Nicole Cosplay Print! Add On $20 Comes in some tier levels.

 

Super Fun 11x17 Cara Nicole Cosplay Print! Add-On $20. Comes in some tier levels.

 

Virgin Cover Art Prints - Pick your favorite cover as an 11x17 Art Print!

 

Holofoil Prints!

 

Naughty Prints!

 

Cosplay Prints!

 

 

Campaign Creation and Management by Melone Management. Need help with your next campaign? Contact us today! Connect with Melone Management on Facebook.

Also available as an add-on for $30. ALFRED TRUJILLO - FIRE BREATHERBreathe some flame into your Firebitch collection with this cover drawn and colored by Alfred. Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $20.ALFRED TRUJILLO - OPEN FLAME (2 BOOK SET)Lenadai lends some super smooth colors for this two cover set! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Naughty version also comes in the Red Hot Pack. They are also available as add ons individually! Also available as an add-on for $20 Nice and $35 Naughty.ALFRED TRUJILLO - CATCHING FIREVirgin HOLOFOIL jeweled cover with colors by Ceci De La Cruz will be the crown jewel of your Firebitch collection! Jeweling by our girl Shannon Galarneau aka HRH Princess Jewel <3  Comes with Red Hot, VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $50.ALFRED TRUJILLO - BEDS ARE BURNINGSanju Nivangune is red hot with the colors for this holofoil cover! Comes with Red Hot, VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $30.ALFRED TRUJILLO & SHELBY ROBERTSON - ASM 316 HOMAGEPixeltool laid down some sweet colors on this Amazing Spider Man 316 homage cover! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $20.ALFRED TRUJILLO - WINGS OF FIRETevan is out of this world with his spectacular colors! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $20. GUEST ARTISTS (alphabetical)ANTHONY DELANEY - SHE'S SO UNUSUAL Cindy Lauper HomageYou know AYEDEE himself has those rocker covers down! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $20.ASH MADI - ROCK ONThrow them horns! Colors by Federico Pepito Sioc Jr. Comes with Red Hot, VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $20.CB ZANE - ARMY OF DARKNESS HOMAGEHail to the Firebitch, baby! Colors by the awesome Ylenia DiNapoli. Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on  for $20.COURTNEY ROSE - ALL I WANT FOR CHRISTMASGet in the holiday spirit with this Mariah Carey homage. Colors by Federico Pepito Sioc Jr. Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $20.DAVE HARRIGAN: NIP SLIPReady? Switch! Fits well enough! Comes with Red Hot, VIP, and Producer packages.Also available as an add-on for $20. JT MOLLOY - BEST SHOT JT did a lovely job with our two girls! Show him some love. Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $20.LENA DAI - SOME LIKE IT HOT (2 BOOK SET)Lena brings the heat on this two book set. Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Naughty comes with Red Hot. Also available individually as Add-Ons! $20 Nice, $35 Naughty.LUCIO PARRILLO - FIRE AWAYGet this beautiful virgin cover in HOLOFOIL by the new MASTER ARTIST Lucio Parrillo. Comes with Red Hot, VIP, and Producer packages. Also available as an add-on for $40SHIKARII - SPACE HOTTIE (3 BOOK  FOIL VIRGIN SET)This three cover set is out of this world!! Shikarii has totally brought out the big guns for his cover and it is oh so shiny! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Nude comes in the Red Hot pack. Also available as add ons.  Nice: $40 Bikini: $45 & Naughty: $50STEF WILSON - BLINDED BY THE LIGHT (2 BOOK SET)Her clothes must have burned off! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Naughty comes in the Red Hot Pack. Also available as add ons. Nice: $20 Naughty: $35WENDY SHANER - FLAMING DEVIL (2 BOOK SET)Naughty Faeries creator Wendy brings us her sweet brand of 3d art! Comes with VIP, and Producer packages. Naughty comes in the Red Hot Pack. Also available as add ons.
